text: "MAIS il n'y a pas que cette France, que cette France glorieuse, que
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cette France r<e9>volutionnaire, cette France <e9>mancipatrice et
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: initiatrice du genre humain, que cette France d'une activit<e9>
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: merveilleuse et comme on l'a dit, cette France nourrie des id<e9>es
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: g<e9>n<e9>rales du monde, il y a une autre France que je n'aime pas moins,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: une autre France qui m'est encore plus ch<e8>re, c'est la France
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mis<e9>rable, c'est la France vaincue et humili<e9>e, c'est la France qui
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: est accabl<e9>e, c'est la France qui tra<ee>ne son boulet depuis quatorze
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: si<e8>cles, la France qui crie, suppliante vers la justice et vers la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: France-l<e0>, je l'aime."--GAMBETTA, _Discours_, 29 _September_, 1872.

text: _JE serais heureux que le public anglais s<fb>t le bien que je pense du
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: livre de M. Gunn, sur la philosophie francaise depuis 1851. Le sujet
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: choisi est neuf, car il n'existe pas, <e0> ma connaissance, d'ouvrage
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: relatif <e0> toute cette p<e9>riode de la philosophie fran<e7>aise. Le beau
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: livre que M. Parodi vient de publier en fran<e7>ais traite surtout des
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: vingt derni<e8>res ann<e9>es de notre activit<e9> philosophique. M. Gunn,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: remontant jusqu'<e0> Auguste Comte, a eu raison de placer ainsi devant
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: nous toute le seconde moiti<e9> du si<e8>cle pass<e9>. Cette p<e9>riode de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cinquante ans qui a pr<e9>c<e9>d<e9>e notre vingti<e8>me si<e8>cle est d'une
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: importance capitale. Elle constitue r<e9>ellement notre dix-neuvi<e8>me
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: si<e8>cle philosophique, car l'oeuvre m<ea>me de Maine de Biran, qui est
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ant<e9>rieure, n'a <e9>t<e9> bien connue et <e9>tudi<e9>e qu'<e0> ce moment, et la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: plupart de nos id<e9>es philosophiques actuelles ont <e9>t<e9> <e9>labor<e9>es
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pendant ces cinquante ans._

author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Le sujet est d'ailleurs d'une complication extr<ea>me, en raison du
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: nombre et de la vari<e9>t<e9> des doctrines, en raison surtout de la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: diversit<e9> des questions entre lesquelles se sont partag<e9>s tant de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: penseurs. Dr. Gunn a su ramener toutes ces questions <e0> un petit nombre
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: de probl<e8>mes essentiels : la science, la libert<e9>, le progr<e8>s, la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: morale, la religion. Cette division me para<ee>t heureuse. Elle r<e9>pond
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: bien, ce me semble, aux principales pr<e9>occupations de la philosophie
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: francaise. Elle a permis <e0> l'auteur d'<ea>tre complet, tout en restant
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: simple, clair, et facile <e0> suivre._
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Elle pr<e9>sente, il est vrai, un inconv<e9>nient, en ce qu'elle morcelle
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: la doctrine d'un auteur en fragments dont chacun, pris <e0> part, perd un
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: peu de sa vitalite et de son individualit<e9>. Elle risque ainsi de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pr<e9>senter comme trop semblable <e0> d'autres la solution que tel
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophe a donn<e9>e de tel probl<e8>me, solution qui, replac<e9>e dans
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: l'ensemble de la doctrine, appara<ee>trait comme propre <e0> ce penseur,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: originale et plus forte. Mais cet inconv<e9>nient <e9>tait in<e9>vitable et
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: l'envers de l'avantage que je signalais plus haut, celui de l'ordre,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: de la continuit<e9> et de la clart<e9>._
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Le travail du Dr. Gunn m'appara<ee>t comme tout <e0> fait distingu<e9>. Il
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: t<e9>moigne d'une information singuli<e8>rement <e9>tendue, pr<e9>cise et s<fb>re.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: C'est l'oeuvre d'un esprit d'une extr<ea>me souplesse, capable de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: s'assimiler vite et bien la pens<e9>e des philosophes, de classer les
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: id<e9>es dans leur ordre d'importance, de les exposer m<e9>thodiquement et
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: les appr<e9>cier <e0> leur juste valeur._

text: PREFACE
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: THIS work is the fruit of much reading and research done in Paris at
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Sorbonne and Biblioth<e8>que nationale. It is, substantially, a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: revised form of the thesis presented by the writer to the University
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Liverpool for the degree of Doctor in Philosophy, obtained in 1921.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The author is indebted, therefore, to the University for permission to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: publish. More especially must he record his deep gratitude to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French thinkers who gave both stimulus and encouragement to him during
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his sojourn in Paris. Foremost among these is M. Henri Bergson, upon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: whose _rapport_ the Doctorate was conferred, and who has expressed his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: appreciation of the work by contributing a Foreword for publication.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Mention must also be made of the encouragement given by the late M.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Emile Boutroux and by the eminent editor of the well-known _Revue de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: M<e9>taphysique et de Morale_, M. Xavier L<e9>on, a leading spirit in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Soci<e9>t<e9> de Philosophie_, whose meetings the writer was privileged to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attend by invitation. Then MM. Brunschvicg, Levy- Bruhl, Lalande, Rey
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Lenoir, from time to time discussed the work with him and he must
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: record his appreciation of their kindness.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: To Professor Mair of Liverpool is due the initial suggestion, and it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: has been felt a fitting tribute to his supervision, criticism,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: encouragement and sympathy that this book should be respectfully
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dedicated to him by one of his grateful pupils. In the labour of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dealing with the proofs, the writer has to acknowledge the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: co-operation of Miss M. Linn and Mr. J. E. Turner, M.A.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The method adopted in this history has been deliberately chosen for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: its usefulness in emphasising the development of ideas. A purely
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: chronological method has not been followed. The biographical system
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: has likewise been rejected. The history of the development of thought
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: centres round problems, and it progresses in relation to these
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problems. The particular manner in which the main problems presented
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: themselves to the French thinkers of the second half of the nineteenth
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: century was largely determined by the events and ideas which marked
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the period from 1789 to 1851. For this reason a chapter has been
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: devoted to Antecedents. Between the Revolution and the _coup d'<e9>tat_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Napoleon III., four distinct lines of thought are discernible. Then
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the main currents from the year 1851 down to 1921 are described, with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: special reference to the development of the main problems. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reconciliation of _science_ and _conscience_ proved to be the main
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: general problem, which became more definitely that of Freedom. This in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: itself is intimately bound up with the doctrines of progress, of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: history, of ethics and religion. These topics are discussed in a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: manner which shows their bearing upon each other. The conclusion aims
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: at displaying the characteristics of French thought which reveal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: themselves in the study of these great problems. Its vitality,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: concreteness, clearness, brilliance and precision are noted and a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: comparison made between French thought and German philosophy.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: From a general philosophical standpoint few periods could be so
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: fascinating. Few, if any, could show such a complete revolution of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought as that witnessed since the year 1851. To bring this out
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: clearly is the main object of the present book. It is intended to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: serve a double purpose. Primarily, it aims at being a contribution to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the history of thought which will provide a definite knowledge of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: best that has been said and thought among philosophers in France
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: during the last seventy years. Further, it is itself an appeal for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: serious attention to be given to French philosophy. This is a field
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which has been comparatively neglected by English students, so far as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the nineteenth century is concerned, and this is especially true of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: our period, which is roughly that from Comte to Boutroux (who passed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: away last month) and Bergson (who has this year resigned his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: professorship). It is the earnest desire of the writer to draw both
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophical students and lovers of France and its literature to a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: closer study and appreciation of modern French philosophy. Emotion and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sentiment are inadequate bases for an _entente_ which is to be really
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _cordiale_ between any two peoples. An understanding of their deepest
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thoughts is also necessary and desirable. Such an understanding is,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: after all, but a step towards that iternationalisation of thought,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that common fund of human culture and knowledge, which sets itself as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: an ideal before the nations of the world. _La philosophie n'a pas de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: patrie! Les id<e9>es sont actuellement les forces internationales._

text: ANTECEDENTS
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: THIS work deals with the great French thinkers since the time of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Auguste Comte, and treats, under various aspects, the development of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought in relation to the main problems which confronted these men.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In the commencement of such an undertaking we are obliged to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: acknowledge the continuity of human thought, to recognise that it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tends to approximate to an organic whole, and that, consequently,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: methods resembling those of surgical amputation are to be avoided. We
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cannot absolutely isolate one period of thought. For this reason a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: brief survey of the earlier years is necessary in order to orient the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: approach to the period specially placed in the limelight, namely
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In the world of speculative thought and in the realm of practical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: politics we find reflected, at the opening of the century, the work of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the French Revolutionaries on the one hand, and that of Immanuel Kant
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: on the other. Coupled with these great factors was the pervading
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influence of the Encyclop<e6>dists and of the thinkers of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Enlightenment. These two groups of influences, the one sudden and in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the nature of a shock to political and metaphysical thought, the other
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: quieter but no less effective, combined to produce a feeling of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: instability and of dissatisfaction at the close of the eighteenth
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: century. A sense of change, indeed of resurrection, filled the minds
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and hearts of those who saw the opening of the nineteenth century. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: old aristocracy and the monarchy in France had gone, and in philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the old metaphysic had received a blow at the hands of the author of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Three Critiques.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: No better expression was given to the psychological state of France at
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this time than that of Alfred de Musset in his _Confession d'un Enfant
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: du Si<e8>cle_. _Toute la maladie du si<e8>cle pr<e9>sent_ (he wrote) _vient de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: deux causes; le peuple qui a pass<e9> par '93 et par 1814 porte au cur
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: deux blessures. Tout ce qui <e9>tait n'est plus; tout ce qui sera n'est
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pas encore. Ne cherchez ailleurs le secret de nos maux.__*_ De
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Musset was right, the whole course of the century was marked by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: conflict between two forces--on the one hand a tendency to reaction
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and conservatism, on the other an impulse to radicalism and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: revolution.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : The extract is taken from _Premi<e8>re partie_, ch. 2.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The book was published in 1836. Somewhat similar sentiments are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: uttered with reference to this time by Michelet. (See his _Histoire du
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: XIXe Si<e8>cle_, vol. i., p. 9).]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It is true that one group of thinkers endeavoured, by a perfectly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: natural reaction, to recall their fellow-countrymen, at this time of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unrest, back to the doctrines and traditions of the past, and tried to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: find in the faith of the Christian Church and the practice of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Catholic religion a rallying-point. The monarchy and the Church were
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: eulogised by Chateaubriand, while on the more philosophical side
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: efforts on behalf of traditionalism were made very nobly by De Bonald
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Joseph de Maistre. While they represented the old aristocracy and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: recalled the theocracy and ecclesiasticism of the past by advocating
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reaction and Ultramontanism, Lamennais attempted to adapt Catholicism
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the new conditions, only to find, as did Renan later, that "one
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cannot argue with a bar of iron." Not the brilliant appeals of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Lacordaire, who thundered from Notre Dame, nor the modernism of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Lamennais, nor the efforts in religious philosophy made by De Maistre,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: were, however, sufficient to meet the needs of the time.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The old traditions and the old dogmas did not offer the salvation they
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: professed to do. Consequently various groups of thinkers worked out
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: solutions satisfactory to themselves and which they offered to others.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We can distinguish clearly four main currents, the method of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: introspection and investigation of the inner life of the soul, the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: adoption of a spiritualist philosophy upon an eclectic basis, the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: search for a new society after the manner of the socialists and,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: lastly, a positive philosophy and religion of humanity. These four
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: currents form the historical antecedents of our period and to a brief
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: survey of them we now turn.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: I
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: To find the origin of many of the tendencies which appear prominently
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in the thought of the second half of the nineteenth century,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: particularly those displayed by the new spiritualistic philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (which marked the last thirty years of the century), we must go back
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the period of the Revolution, to Maine de Biran (1766-1824)-- a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unique and original thinker who laid the foundations of modern French
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychology and who was, we may note in passing, a contemporary of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Chateaubriand. A certain tone of romanticism marks the work of both
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the literary man and the philosopher. Maine de Biran was not a thinker
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: who reflected upon his own experiences in retreat from the world. Born
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a Count, a Lifeguardsman to Louis XVI. at the Revolution, and faithful
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the old aristocracy, he was appointed, at the Restoration, to an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: important administrative position, and later became a deputy and a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: member of the State Council. His writings were much greater in extent
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: than is generally thought, but only one important work appeared in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: publication during his lifetime. This was his treatise, or _m<e9>moire_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: entitled _Habitude_, which appeared in 1803. This work well
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: illustrates Maine de Biran's historical position in the development of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French philosophy. It came at a tome when attention and interest, so
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: far as philosophical problems were concerned, centred round two
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "foci." These respective centres are indicated by Destutt de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Tracy,_*_ the disciple of Condillac on the one hand, and by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Cabanis_/-_ on the other. Both were "ideologues" and were ridiculed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by Napoleon who endeavoured to lay much blame upon the philosophers.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We must notice, however, this difference. While the school of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Condillac,_/=_ influenced by Locke, endeavoured to work out a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychology in terms of abstractions, Cabanis, anxious to be more
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: concrete, attempted to interpret the life of the mind by reference to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: physical and physiological phenomena.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Destutt de Tracy, 1754-1836. His _Elements of Ideology_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: appeared in 1801. He succeeded Cabanis in the Acad<e9>mie in 1808, and in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a complimentary _Discours_ pronounced upon his predecessor claimed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that Cabanis had introduced medicine into philosophy and philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: into medicine. This remark might well have been applied later to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Claude Bernard.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : Cabanis, 1757-1808, _Rapports du Physique et du
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Morale de l'Homme_, 1802. He was a friend of De Biran, as also was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Amp<e8>re, the celebrated physicist and a man of considerable
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophical power. A group used to meet _chez Cabanis_ at Auteuil,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: comprising De Biran, Cabanis, Amp<e8>re, Royard-Collard, Guizot, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Cousin.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/=_ : Condillac belongs to the eighteenth century. He died
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in 1780. His _Trait<e9> des Sensations_ is dated 1754.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It is the special merit of De Biran that he endeavoured, and that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: successfully, to establish both the concreteness and the essential
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spirituality of the inner life. The attitude and method which he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: adopted became a force in freeing psychology, and indeed philosophy in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: general, from mere play with abstractions. His doctrines proved
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: valuable, too, in establishing the reality and irreducibility of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mental or spiritual nature of man.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Maine de Biran took as his starting-point a psychological fact, the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reality of conscious effort. The self is active rather than
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: speculative; the self is action or effort-- that is to say, the self
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is, fundamentally and primarily, will. For the Cartesian formula
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Cogito, ergo sum,_ De Biran proposed to substitute that of _Volo,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ergo sum_. He went on to maintain that we have an internal and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: immediate perception of this effort of will through which we realise,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: at one and the same time, our self in its fullest activity and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: resistance to its operations. In such effort we realise ourselves as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: free causes and, in spite of the doctrine of physical determinism, we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: realise in ourselves the self as a cause of its own volitions. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: greater the resistance or the greater the effort, the more do we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: realise ourselves as being free and not the absolute victims of habit.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Of this freedom we have an immediate consciousness, it is _une donn<e9>e
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: imm<e9>diate de la conscience._
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This freedom is not always realised, for over against the tendency to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: action we must set the counter-tendency to passivity. Between these
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: two exists, in varying degrees of approach to the two extremes,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _habitude_. Our inner life is seen by the psychologist as a field of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: conflict between the sensitive and the reflective side of our nature.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It is this which gives to the life of this _homo duplex_ all the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: elements of struggle and tragedy. In the desires and the passions,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: says Maine de Biran, the true self is not seen. The true self appears
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in memory, reasoning and, above all, in will.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Such, in brief, is the outline of De Biran's psychology. To his two
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: stages, _vie sensitive_ and _vie active_ (_ou r<e9>flexive_), he added a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: third, _la vie divine_. In his religious psychology he upheld the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: great Christian doctrines of divine love and grace as against the less
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: human attitude of the Stoics. He still insists upon the power of will
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and action and is an enemy of the religious vice of quietism. In his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: closing years De Biran penned his ideas upon our realisation of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: divine love by intuition. His intense interest in the inner life of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the spirit gives De Biran's _Journal Intime_ a rank among the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: illuminating writings upon religious psychology.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Maine de Biran was nothing if not a psychologist. The most absurd
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: statement ever made about him was that he was "the French Kant." This
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is very misleading, for De Biran's genius showed itself in his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychological power and not in critical metaphysics. The importance of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his work and his tremendous influence upon our period, especially upon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the new spiritualism, will be apparent. Indeed he himself foresaw the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: great possibilities which lay open to philosophy along the lines he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: laid down. "_Qui sait,_" he remarked,_*_ "_tout ce que peut la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: r<e9>flection concentr<e9>e et s'il n'y a pas un nouveau monde int<e9>rieur qui
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pourra <ea>tre d<e9>couvert un jour par quelque 'Colomb m<e9>taphysicien.'_"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: With Maine de Biran began the movement in French philosophy which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: worked through the writings of Ravaisson, Lachelier, Guyau, Boutroux
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and particularly Bergson. A careful examination of the philosophy of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this last thinker shows how great is his debt to Maine de Biran, whose
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: inspiration he warmly acknowledges.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Pens<e9>es, p. 213.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: But it is only comparatively recently that Maine de Biran has come to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his own and that his real power and influence have been recognised.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: There are two reasons for this, firstly the lack of publication of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: writings, and secondly his being known for long only through the work
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Cousin and the Eclectics, who were imperfectly acquainted with his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work. Upon this school of thought he had some little influence which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was immediate and personal, but Cousin, although he edited some of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unpublished work, failed to appreciate its originality and value.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: So for a time De Biran's influence waned when that of Cousin himself
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: faded. Maine de Biran stands quite in a different category from the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Eclectics, as a unique figure at a transition period, the herald of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the best that was to be in the thought of the century. Cousin and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Eclectic school, however, gained the official favour, and eclecticism
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was for many years the "official philosophy."
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: II
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This Eclectic School was due to the work of various thinkers, of whom
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: we may cite Laromigui<e8>re (1756-1837), who marks the transition from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Condillac, Royer-Collard (1763-1845), who, abandoning Condillac,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: turned for inspiration to the Scottish School (particularly to Reid),
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Victor Cousin (1792-1867), Jouffroy (1796-1842) and Paul Janet
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1823-1899), the last of the notable eclectics. Of these "the chief"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was Cousin. His personality dominated this whole school of thought,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his _ipse dixit_ was the criterion of orthodoxy, an orthodoxy which we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: must note was supported by the powers of officialdom.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: He rose from the Ecole Normale Sup<e9>rieure to a professorship at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Sorbonne, which he held from the Restoration (1815 to 1830), with a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: break of a few years during which his course was suspended. These
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: years he spent in Germany, to which country attention had been
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attracted by the work of Madame de Sta<eb>l, _De l'Allemagne_ (1813).
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: From 1830 to the beginning of our period (1851) Cousin, as director of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Ecole Normale Sup<e9>rieure, as a _pair de France_ and a minister of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: state, organised and controlled the education of his country. He thus
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: exercised a very great influence over an entire generation of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Frenchmen, to whom he propounded the doctrines of his spiritualism.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: His teaching was marked by a strong reaction against the doctrines of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the previous century, which had given such value to the data of sense.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Cousin abhorred the materialism involved in these doctrines, which he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: styled _une doctrine d<e9>solante_, and he endeavoured to raise the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dignity and conception of man as a spiritual being. In the Preface to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his Lectures of 1818, _Du Vrai, du Beau et du Bien_ (Edition of 1853),
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: published first in 1846, he lays stress upon the elements of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy, which he presents as a true spiritualism, for it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: subordinates the sensory and sensual to the spiritual. He upholds the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: essentially spiritual nature of man, his liberty, moral responsibility
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and obligation, the dignity of human virtue, disinterestedness,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: charity, justice and beauty. These fruits of the spirit reveal, Cousin
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: claimed, a God who is both the author and the ideal type of humanity,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a Being who is not indifferent to the welfare and happiness of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: creatures. There is a vein of romanticism about Cousin, and in him may
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: be seen the same spirit which, on the literary side, was at work in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Hugo, Lamartine and De Vigny.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Cousin's philosophy attached itself rather to the Scottish school of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "common sense" than to the analytic type of doctrine which had
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: prevailed in his own country in the previous century. To this he added
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: much from various sources, such as Schelling and Hegel among the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: moderns, Plato and the Alexandrians among the ancients. In viewing the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: history of philosophy, Cousin advocated a division of systems into
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: four classes--sensualism, idealism, scepticism and mysticism. Owing to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the insufficiency of his _v<e9>rit<e9>s de sens commun_ he was prone to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: confuse the history of philosophy with philosophy itself. There is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: perhaps no branch of science or art so intimately bound up with its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: own history as is philosophy, but we must beware of substituting an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: historical survey of problems for an actual handling of those problems
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: themselves. Cousin, however, did much to establish in his native land
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the teaching of the history of philosophy.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: His own aim was to found a metaphysic spiritual in character, based
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upon psychology. While he did not agree with the system of Kant, he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rejected the doctrines of the empiricists and set his influence
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: against the materialistic and sceptical tendencies of his time. Yet he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cannot be excused from "opportunism" not only in politics but in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought. In order to retain his personal influence he endeavoured to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: present his philosophy as a sum of doctrines perfectly consistent with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Catholic faith. This was partly, no doubt, to counteract the work
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and influence of that group of thinkers already referred to as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Traditionalists, De Bonald, De Maistre and Lamennais. Cousin's efforts
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in this direction, however, dissatisfied both churchmen and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophers and gave rise to the remark that his teaching was but
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _une philosophie de convenance_. We must add too that the vagueness of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his spiritual teaching was largely responsible for the welcome
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: accorded by many minds to the positivist teaching of Auguste Comte.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: While Maine de Biran had a real influence upon the thought of our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: period 1851-1921, Cousin stands in a different relation to subsequent
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought, for that thought is largely characterised by its being a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reaction against eclecticism. Positivism rose as a direct revolt
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: against it, the neo-critical philosophy dealt blows at both, while
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Ravaisson, the initiator of the neo-spiritualism, upon whom Cousin did
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: not look very favourably, endeavoured to reorganise upon a different
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: footing, and on sounder principles, free from the deficiencies which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: must always accompany eclectic thought, those ideas and ideals to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which Cousin in his spiritualism had vaguely indicated his loyalty. It
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is interesting to note that Cousin's death coincides in date with the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: foundation of the neo-spiritual philosophy by Ravaisson's celebrated
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: manifesto to idealists, for such, as we shall see, was his _Rapport
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sur la Philosophie au Dix-neuvi<e8>me Si<e8>cle_ (1867). Cousin's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualism had a notable influence upon several important men--e.g.,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Michelet and his friend Edgar Quinet, and more indirectly upon Renan.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The latter spoke of him in warm terms as un _excitateur de ma
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pens<e9>e_._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : It is worth noting that two of the big currents of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: opposition, those of Comte and Renouvier, arose outside the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: professional and official teaching, free from the University which was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: entirely dominated by Cousin. This explains much of the slowness with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which Comte and Renouvier were appreciated.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Among Cousin's disciples one of the most prominent was Jouffroy of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Coll<e8>ge de France. The psychological interest was keen in his work,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: but his _M<e9>langes philosophiques_ (1883) showed him to be occupied
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with the problem of human destiny. Paul Janet was a noble upholder of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the eclectic doctrine or older spiritualism, while among associates
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and tardy followers must be mentioned Gamier, Damiron, Franke, Caro
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Jules Simon.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: III
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We have seen how, as a consequence of the Revolution and of the cold,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: destructive, criticism of the eighteenth century, there was a demand
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for constructive thought. This was a desire common not only to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Traditionalists but to De Biran and Cousin. They aimed at intellectual
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reconstruction. While, however, there were some who combated the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: principles of the Revolution, as did the Traditionalists, while some
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tried to correct and to steady those principles (as De Biran and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Cousin), there were others who endeavoured to complete them and to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: carry out a more rigorous application of the Revolutionary watchwords,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Libert<e9>_, _Egalit<e9>_, _Fraternit<e9>_. The Socialists (and later Comte)
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: aimed at not merely intellectual, but social reconstruction.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The Revolution and the War had shown men that many changes could be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: produced in society in a comparatively short time. This encouraged
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: bold and imaginative spirits. Endeavours after better things, after
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: new systems and a new order of society, showed themselves. The work of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: political philosophers attempted to give expression to the socialist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idea of society. For long there had been maintained the ecclesiastical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: conception of a perfect social order in another world. It was now
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought that humanity would be better employed, not in imagining the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: glories of a "hereafter," but in "tilling its garden," in striving to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: realise here on earth something of that blessed fellowship and happy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: social order treasured up in heaven. This is the dominant note of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: socialism, which is closely bound up at its origin, not only with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: political thought, but with humanitarianism and a feeling essentially
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religious. Its progress is a feature of the whole century.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The most notable expression of the new socialistic idea was that of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Count Henri de Saint-Simon (1760-1825), a relative of the celebrated
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Duke. He had great confidence in the power of science as an instrument
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for social reconstruction, and he took over from a medical man, Dr.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Burdin, the notions which, later on, Auguste Comte was to formulate
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: into the doctrines of Positivism. Saint-Simon's influence showed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: itself while the century was young, his first work _Lettres d'un
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Habitant de Gen<e8>ve_ appearing in 1803. In this he outlined a scheme
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for placing the authoritative power of the community, not in the hands
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Church and State, but in a freely elected body of thinkers and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _artistes_. He then endeavoured to urge the importance of order in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: society, as a counterpart to the order erected by science in the world
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of knowledge. To this end was directed his _Introduction aux Travaux
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: scientifiques du Dix-neuvi<e8>me Si<e8>cle_ (1807-8). He also indicated the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: importance for social welfare of abandoning the preoccupation with an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: imaginary heaven, and pointed out that the more social and political
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: theory could be emancipated from the influence of theological dogmas
