title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the better. At the same time he quite recognised the importance of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religious beliefs to a community, and his sociological view of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religion foreshadowed Guyau's study, an important work which will
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: claim our attention in due course.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In 1813, Saint-Simon published his _M<e9>moire sur la Science de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: l'Homme_, in which he laid down notions which were the germ of Auguste
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte's _Law of the Three Stages_. With the peace which followed the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Battle of Waterloo, a tremendous stimulus was given in France to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: industrial activity, and Saint-Simon formulated his motto "All by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: industry and all for industry." Real power, he showed, lay not in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: hands of governments or government agents, but with the industrial
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: class. Society therefore should be organised in the manner most
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: favourable to the working class. Ultimate economic and political power
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rests with them. These ideas he set forth in _L'Industrie_, 1817-18,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _La Politique_, 1819, _L'Organisateur_, 1819-30, _Le Syst<e8>me
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: industriel_, 1821-22, _Le Cat<e9>chisme des Industriels_, 1822-24. Since
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1817 among his fellow- workers were now Augustin Thierry and young
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Auguste Comte, his secretary, the most important figure in the history
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the first half of the century.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Finding that exposition and reasoned demonstration of his ideas were
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: not sufficient, Saint-Simon made appeal to sentiment by his _Appel aux
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Philanthropes_, a treatise on human brotherhood and solidarity. This
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he followed up in 1825 by his last book, published the year of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: death, _Le Nouveau Christianisme_. This book endeavoured to outline a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religion which should prove itself capable of reorganising society by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: inculcating the brotherhood of man in a more effective manner than
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that of the Christian Church. _Fraternit<e9>_ was the watchword he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: stressed, and he placed women on an equal political and social footing
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with men. He set forth the grave deficiencies of the Christian
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrines as proclaimed by Catholic and Protestant alike. Both are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cursed by the sin of individualism, the virtue of saving one's own
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: soul, while no attempt at social salvation is made. Both Catholics and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Protestants he labelled vile heretics, inasmuch as they have turned
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: aside from the social teaching of Christianity. If we are to love our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: neighbour as ourselves we must as a whole community work for the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: betterment of our fellows socially, by erecting a form of society more
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in accord with Christian principles. We must strive to do it here and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: now, and not sit piously getting ready for the next world. We must not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: think it religious to despise the body or material welfare. God
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: manifests Himself as matter and spirit, so Religion must not despise
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: economics but rather unite industry and science as Love unites spirit
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and matter. Eternal Life, of which Christianity makes so much, is not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to be sought, argued Saint-Simon, in another world, but here and now
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in the love and service of our brothers, in the uplift of humanity as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a whole.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Saint-Simon believed in a fated progress and an inevitable betterment
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the condition of the working classes. The influence of Hegel's view
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of history and Condorcet's social theories is apparent in some of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: writings. His insistence upon organisation, social authority and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: depreciative view of liberty which he held show well how he was the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: real father of many later doctrines and of applications of these
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrines, as for example by Lenin in the Soviet system of Bolshevik
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Russia. Saint-Simon foreshadowed the dictatorship of the proletariat,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: although his scheme of social organisation involved a triple division
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of humanity into intellectuals, artists and industrials. Many of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrines had a definite communistic tendency. Among them we find
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: indicated the abolition of all hereditary rights of inheritance and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the distribution of property is placed, as in the communist programme,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in the hands of the organising authority. Saint-Simon had a keen
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: insight into modern social conditions and problems. He stressed the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: economic inter-relationships and insisted that the world must be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: regarded as "one workshop." A statement of the principles of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Saint- Simonist School, among whom was the curious character Enfantin,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was presented to the _Chambre des D<e9>put<e9>s_ in the critical year 1830.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The disciples seem to have shown a more definite communism than their
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: master. The influence of Saint-Simon, precursor of both socialism and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positivism, had considerable influence upon the social philosophy of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the whole century. It only diminished when the newer type of socialist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrine appeared, the so-called "scientific" socialism of Marx and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Engels. Saint-Simon's impulse, however, acted powerfully upon the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: minds of most of the thinkers of the century, especially in their
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: youth. Renouvier and Renan were fired with some of his ideas. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spirit of Saint-Simon expressed itself in our period by promoting an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intense interest in philosophy as applied to social problems.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Saint-Simon was not, however, the only thinker at this time with a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: social programme to offer. In contrast to his scheme we have that of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fourier (1772-1837) who endeavoured to avoid the suppression of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: liberty involved in the organisation proposed by Saint-Simon.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The psychology of Fourier was peculiar and it coloured his ethical and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: social doctrine. He believed that the evils of the world were due to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the repression of human passions. These in themselves, if given
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: liberty of expression, would prove harmonious. As Newton had
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: propounded the law of the universal attraction of matter, Fourier
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: endeavoured to propound the law of attraction between human beings.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Passion and desire lead to mutual attraction; the basis of society is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: free association.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fourier's _Trait<e9> de l'Association domestique et agricole_ (1822),
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which followed his _Th<e9>orie des Quatre Mouvements_ (1808), proposed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the formation of associations or groups, _phalanges_, in which workers
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unite with capital for the self-government of industry. He, like
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Saint- Simon, attacks idlers, but the two thinkers look upon the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: capitalist manager as a worker. The intense class- antagonism of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: capitalist and labourer had not yet formulated itself and was not felt
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: strongly until voiced on behalf of the proletariat by Proudhon and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Marx. Fourier's proposals were those of a _bourgeois_ business man who
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: knew the commercial world intimately, who criticised it and condemned
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the existing system of civilisation. Various experiments were made to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: organise communities based upon his _phalanges_.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Cabet, the author of _Icaria_ (1840) and _Le nouveau Christianisme_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was a further power in the promotion of socialism and owed not a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: little of his inspiration to Robert Owen.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The most interesting and powerful of the early socialist philosophers
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is undoubtedly Proudhon (1809- 1865), a striking personality, much
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: misunderstood.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: While Saint-Simon, a count, came from the aristocracy, Fourier from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the _bourgeoisie_, Proudhon was a real son of the people, a mouthpiece
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the proletariat. He was a man of admirable mental energy and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: learning, which he had obtained solely by his own efforts and by a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: struggle with poverty and misery. Earnest and passionate by nature, he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: yet formulated his doctrines with more sanity and moderation than is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: usually supposed. Labels of "atheist" and "anarchist" have served well
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to misrepresent him. Certainly two of his watchwords were likely
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: enough to raise hostility in many quarters. "God," he said, "is evil,"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "Property is theft." This last maxim was the subject of his book,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: published in 1840, _Qu'est-ce que la propri<e9>t<e9>_? (_ou, Recherches sur
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: le principe du droit et du gouvernement_) to which his answer was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "_C'est le vol!_" Proudhon took up the great watchword of _Egalit<e9>_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and had a passion for social justice which he based on "the right to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the whole product of labour." This could only come by mutual exchange,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: fairly and freely. He distinguished between private "property" and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: individual "possession." The latter is an admitted fact and is not to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: be abolished; what he is anxious to overthrow is private "property,"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which is a toll upon the labour of others and is therefore ultimately
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and morally theft. He hated the State for its support of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "thieves," and his doctrines are a philosophy of anarchy. He further
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: enunciated them in _Syst<e8>me des Contradictions <e9>conomiques_ (1846) and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _De la Justice_ (1858). In 1848 he was elected a _d<e9>put<e9>_ and,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: together with Louis Blanc and Pierre Leroux, figured in the Revolution
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of 1848. Blanc was a man of action, who had a concrete scheme for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: transition from the capitalist r<e9>gime to the socialist state. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: believed in the organisation of labour, universal suffrage and a new
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: distribution of wealth, but he disapproved strongly of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dictatorship of the proletariat and of violent revolution. Proudhon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: expressed his great admiration for Blanc.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The work of both of these men is a contradiction to the assertion put
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: forward by the Marxian school that socialist doctrine was merely
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sentimental, utopian and "unscientific" prior to Marx. Many of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: views of Proudhon and Blanc were far more "scientific" than those of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Marx, because they were closer to facts. Proudhon differed profoundly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: from Marx in his view of history in which he saw the influence of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ideas and ideals, as well as the operation of purely economic factors.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: To the doctrine of a materialistic determination of history Proudhon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rightly opposes that of a spiritual determination, by the thoughts and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ideals of men._*_ The true revolution Proudhon and Blanc maintained
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: can come only through the power of ideas.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_: Indeed, it is highly probable that with the growing
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dissatisfaction with Marxian theories the work of Proudhon will come
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: into greater prominence, replacing largely that of Marx.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: On the personal relations of Proudhon with Marx (1818-1883), who was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: nine years younger than the Frenchman, see the interesting volume by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Marx's descendant, M. Jean Longuet (D<e9>put<e9> de la Seine), _La Politique
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: internationale du Marxisme_ (_Karl Marx et la France_) (Alcan).
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: On the debt of Marx to the French social thinkers see the account
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: given by Professor Charles Andler in his special edition of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Communist Manifesto, _Le Manifeste Communiste_ (_avec introduction
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: historique et commentaire_), (Rieder), also the last section of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier's Philosophie analytique de l'Histoire, vol. iv.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: All these early socialist thinkers had this in common: they agreed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that purely economic solutions would not soothe the ills of society,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: but that moral, religious and philosophic teaching must accompany, or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rather precede, all efforts towards social reform. The earliest of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: them, Saint-Simon, had asserted that no society, no system of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: civilisation, can endure if its spiritual principles and its economic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: organisation are in direct contradiction. When brotherly love on the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: one hand and merciless competition on the other are equally extolled,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: then hypocrisy, unrest and conflict are inevitable.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: IV
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The rise of positivism ranks with the rise of socialism as a movement
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of primary importance. Both were in origin nearer to one another than
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: they now appear to be. We have seen how Saint-Simon was imbued with a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spirit of social reform, a desire to reorganise human society. This
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: desire Auguste Comte (1798-1857) shared; he felt himself called to it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as a sacred work, and he extolled his "incomparable mission." He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: lamented the anarchical state of the world and contrasted it with the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: world of the ancients and that of the Middle Ages. The harmony and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: stability of mediaeval society were due, Comte urged, to the spiritual
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: power and unity of the Catholic Church and faith. The liberty of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Reformation offers no real basis for society, it is the spirit of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: criticism and of revolution. The modern world needs a new spiritual
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: power. Such was Comte's judgment upon the world of his time. Where in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the modern world could such a new organising power be found? To this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: question Comte gave an answer similar to that of Saint-Simon: he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: turned to science. The influence of Saint-Simon is here apparent, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: we must note the personal relations between the two men. In 1817 Comte
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: became secretary to Saint-Simon, and became intimately associated with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his ideas and his work. Comte recognised, with his master, the supreme
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: importance of establishing, at the outset, the relations actually
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: obtaining and the relations possible between science and political
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: organisation. This led to the publication, in 1822, of a treatise,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Plan des Travaux scientifiques n<e9>cessaires pour r<e9>organiser la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Soci<e9>t<e9>_, which unfortunately led to a quarrel between the two
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: friends, and finally, in 1824, to a definite rupture by which Comte
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: seems to have been embittered and made rather hostile to his old
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: master and to have assumed an ungenerous attitude._*_ Comte,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: however, being a proud and ambitious spirit, was perhaps better left
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: alone to hew out his own path. In him we have one of the greatest
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: minds of modern France, and his doctrine of positivism is one of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dominating features of the first half of the century.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote *: In considering the relations between Saint-Simon and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte we may usefully compare those between Schelling and Hegel in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Germany.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: His break with Saint-Simon showed his own resources; he had
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: undoubtedly a finer sense of the difficulties of his reforming task
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: than had Saint-Simon; moreover, he possessed a scientific knowledge
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which his master lacked. Such equipment he needed in his ambitious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: task, and it is one of the chief merits of Comte that he _attempted_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: so large a project as the Positive Philosophy endeavoured to be.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This philosophy was contained in his _Cours de Philosophie positive_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1830-1842), which he regarded as the theoretic basis of a reforming
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: political philosophy. One of the most interesting aspects of this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work, however, is its claim to be a positive _philosophy_. Had not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte accepted the Saint-Simonist doctrine of a belief in science as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the great future power in society? How then comes it that he gives us
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a "_philosophie_ positive" in the first place and not, as we might
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: expect, a "_science_ positive"? Comte's answer to this is that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: science, no less than society itself, is disordered and stands in need
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of organisation. The sciences have proceeded to work in a piecemeal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: fashion and are unable to present us with _une vue d'ensemble_. It is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the r<f4>le of philosophy to work upon the data presented by the various
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sciences and, without going beyond these data, to arrange them and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: give us an organic unity of thought, a synthesis, which shall produce
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: order in the mind of man and subsequently in human society.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The precise part to be played by philosophy is determined by the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: existing state of scientific knowledge in the various departments and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: so depends upon the general stage of intelligence which humanity has
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reached. The intellectual development of humanity was formulated
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: generally by Comte in what is known as "The Law of the Three Stages,"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: probably that part of his doctrine which is best known and which is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: most obvious. "The Law of the Three Stages" merely sets down the fact
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that in the race and in the individual we find three successive
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: stages, under which conceptions are formed differently. The first is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the theological or fictitious stage, in which the explanation of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: things is referred to the operations of divine agency. The second is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the metaphysical or abstract stage when, for divinities, abstract
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: principles are substituted. In the third, the scientific or positive
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: stage, the human mind has passed beyond a belief in divine agencies or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: metaphysical abstractions to a rational study of the effective laws of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: phenomena. The human spirit here encounters the real, but it abstains
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: from pretensions to absolute knowledge; it does not theorise about the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: beginning or the end of the universe or, indeed, its absolute nature;
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it takes only into consideration facts within human knowledge. Comte
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: laid great emphasis upon the necessity of recognising the relativity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of all things. All is relative; this is the one absolute principle.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Our knowledge, he insisted (especially in his _Discours sur l'Esprit
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positif_, 1844, which forms a valuable introduction to his thought as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: expressed in his larger works), is entirely relative to our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: organisation and our situation. Relativity, however, does not imply
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: uncertainty. Our knowledge is indeed relative and never absolute, but
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it grows to a greater accord with reality. It is this passion for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "accord with reality" which is characteristic of the scientific or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positivist spirit.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The sciences are themselves relative and much attention is given by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte to the proper classification of the sciences. He determines his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: hierarchy by arranging them in the order in which they have themselves
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: completed the three stages and arrived at positivity. Mathematics,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: astronomy, physics, chemistry, biology and sociology are his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: arrangement. This last named has not yet arrived at the final stage;
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it is but a science in the making. Comte, indeed, himself gives it its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: name and founds it as the science of society, science applied to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: politics, as was first indicated in his scheme of work and early ideas
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of reform.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte strongly insists upon the social aspect of all knowledge and all
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: action. He even goes to the extent of regarding the individual man as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: an abstraction; for him the real being is the social being, Humanity.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The study of human society has a double aspect, which is also a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: feature of the other sciences. As in biology there is the study of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: anatomy on the one hand and of physiology on the other, so in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sociology we must investigate both the laws which govern the existence
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of a society and those which control its movements. The distinction
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is, in short, that of the static and the dynamic, and it embraces in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sociological study the important conceptions of order and of progress.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte very rightly stressed the idea of progress as characteristic of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: modern times, but he lamented its being divorced from that of order.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: He blamed the conservative view of order as responsible for promoting
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: among "progressives" the spirit of anarchy and revolution. A positive
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sociology would, Comte maintained, reconcile a true order, which does
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: not exclude change, with real progress, a movement which is neither
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: destructive nor capricious. Comte here owes a debt in part to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Montesquieu and largely to Condorcet, whose _Esquisse d'un Tableau
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: historique des Progr<e8>s de l'Esprit humain_ (1795) did much to promote
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: serious reflection upon the question of progress.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We have already noted Comte's intense valuation of Humanity as a whole
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as a Supreme Being. In his later years, notably after 1845, when he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: met his "Beatrice" in the person of Clotilde de Vaux, he gave to his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrines a sentimental expression of which the Religion of Humanity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with its ritualism was the outcome. This positivist religion
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: endeavoured to substitute for the traditional God the Supreme Being of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Humanity--a Being capable, according to Comte, of sustaining our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: courage, becoming the end of our actions and the object of our love.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: To this he attached a morality calculated to combat the egoism which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tends to dominate and to destroy mankind and intended to strengthen
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the altruistic motives in man and to raise them to the service of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Humanity.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We find Comte, at the opening of our period, restating his doctrines
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in his _Syst<e8>me de Politique positive_ (1851-54), to which his first
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work was meant to serve as an Introduction. In 1856 he began his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Synth<e8>se subjective_, but he died in 1857. Comte is a singularly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: desolate figure; the powers of officialdom were against him, and he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: existed mainly by what he could gain from teaching mathematics and by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a pension raised by his admirers in England and his own land.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The influence of his philosophy has been great and far- reaching, but
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it is the _spirit_ of positivism which has survived, not its content.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Subsequent developments in science have rendered much of his work
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: obsolete, while his Religion has never made a great appeal. Comte's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: most noted disciple, Littr<e9> (1801-1881), regarded this latter as a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: retrograde step and confined himself to the early part of his master's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work. Most important for us in the present work is Comte's influence
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upon subsequent thinkers in France, notably Taine, and we may add,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renan, Cournot, and even Renouvier, although these last two promoted a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: vigorous reaction against his philosophy in general. He influenced his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: adversaries, a notable testimony. Actually, however, the positivist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy found a greater welcome on the English side of the Channel
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: from John Stuart Mill, Spencer and Lewes. The empiricism of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: English school proved a more fruitful soil for positivism than the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: vague spiritualism of Cousin to which it offered strong opposition.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Positivism, or rather the positivist standpoint in philosophy, turned
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: at a later date to reseek its fatherland and after a sojourn in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: England reappears as an influence in the work of French thinkers near
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the end of the century--e.g., Fouill<e9>e, Guyau, Lachelier, Boutroux and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson express elements of positivism.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We have now passed in review the four main currents of the first half
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the century, in a manner intended to orient the approach to our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: period, 1851-1921. Without such an orientation much of the subsequent
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought would lose its correct colouring and perspective. There is a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: continuity, even if it be partly a continuity marked by reactions, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this will be seen when we now examine the three general currents into
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which the thought of the subsequent period is divided.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: CHAPTER II
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: MAIN CURRENTS
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: THE year 1851 was one of remarkable importance for France; a crisis
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: then occurred in its political and intellectual life. The hopes and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: aspirations to which the Revolution of 1848 had given rise were
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: shattered by the _coup d'<e9>tat_ of Louis Napoleon in the month of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: December. The proclamation of the Second Empire heralded the revival
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of an era of imperialism and reaction in politics, accompanied by a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: decline in liberty and a diminution of idealism in the world of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought. A censorship of books was established, the press was deprived
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of its liberty, and the teaching of philosophy forbidden in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _lyc<e9>es_.*
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : The revival of philosophy in the _lyc<e9>es_ began when
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Victor Drury reintroduced the study of Logic.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Various ardent and thoughtful spirits, whose minds and hearts had been
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: uplifted by the events of 1848, hoping to see the dawn of an era
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: expressing in action the ideals of the first Revolution, _Libert<e9>_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Egalit<e9>_, _Fraternit<e9>_, were bitterly disappointed. Social ideals
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: such as had been created by Saint-Simon and his school received a rude
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rebuff from force, militarism and imperialism. So great was the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mingled disappointment and disgust of many that they left for ever the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: realm of practical politics to apply themselves to the arts, letters
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: or sciences. Interesting examples of this state of mind are to be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: found in Vacherot, Taine, Renan and Renouvier, and, we may add, in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Michelet, Victor Hugo and Edgar Quinet. The first of these, Vacherot,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: who had succeeded Cousin as Professor of Philosophy at the Sorbonne,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: lost his chair, as did Quinet and also Michelet, who was further
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: deprived of his position as Archivist. Hugo and Quinet, having taken
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: active political part in the events of 1848, were driven into exile.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Disgust, disappointment, disillusionment and pessimism characterise
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the attitude of all this group of thinkers to political events, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this reacted not only upon their careers but upon their entire
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy. "With regard to the Second Empire," we find Renan
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: saying,_*_ "if the last ten years of its duration in some measure
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: repaired the mischief done in the first eight, it must never be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: forgotten how strong this Government was when it was a question of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: crushing the intelligence, and how feeble when it came to raising it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: up."
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_: In his Preface to _Souvenirs d'Enfance et de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Jeunesse._]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The disheartening end of the Empire in moral degeneracy and military
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: defeat only added to the gloominess, against which the Red Flag and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the red fires of the Commune cast a lurid and pathetic glow, upon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which the Prussians could look down with a grim smile from the heights
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Paris. Only with the establishment of the Third Republic in 1871,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and its ratification a few years later, does a feeling of cheerfulness
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: make itself felt in the thought of the time. The years from 1880
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: onwards have been remarkable for their fruitfulness in the philosophic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: field--to such an extent do political and social events react upon the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: most philosophical minds. This is a healthy sign; it shows that those
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: minds have not detached themselves from contact with the world, that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the spirit of philosophy is a living spirit and not merely an academic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: or professional product divorced from the fierce realities of history.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We have already indicated, in the treatment of the "Antecedents" of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: our period, the dominance of Eclecticism, supported by the powers of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: officialdom, and have remarked how Positivism arose as a reaction
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: against Cousin's vague spiritualism. In approaching the second half of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the century we may in general characterise its thought as a reaction
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: against both eclecticism and positivism. A transitional current can be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: distinguished where positivism turns, as it were, against itself in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the work of Vacherot, Taine and Renan. The works of Cournot and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: indefatigable Renouvier with his neo-criticism mark another main
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: current. Ultimately there came to triumph towards the close of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: century a new spiritualism, owing much inspiration to De Biran, but
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which, unlike Cousin's doctrines, had suffered the discipline of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positivist spirit. The main contributors to this current are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Ravaisson, Lachelier, Fouill<e9>e and Guyau, Boutroux, Bergson, Blondel
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Weber. Our study deals with the significance of these three
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: currents, and having made this clear we shall then discuss the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: development of thought in connection with the various problems and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ideas in which the philosophy of the period found its expression.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In his _Critique of Pure Reason_ Kant endeavoured, at a time when
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: speculation of a dogmatic and uncritical kind was current, to call
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attention to the necessity for examining the instrument of knowledge
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: itself, and thereby discovering its fitness or inadequacy, as the case
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: might be, for dealing with the problems which philosophy proposes to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: investigate. This was a word spoken in due season and, however much
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: subsequent philosophy has deviated from the conclusions of Kant, it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: has at least remembered the significance of his advice. The result has
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: been that the attitude adopted by philosophers to the problems before
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: them has been determined largely by the kind of answer which they
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: offer to the problems of knowledge itself. Obviously a mind which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: asserts that we can never be sure of knowing anything (or as in some
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cases, that this assertion is itself uncertain) will see all questions
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: through the green-glasses of scepticism. On the other hand, a thinker
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: who believes that we do have knowledge of certain things and can be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: certain of thiss, whether by objective proof or a subjective
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intuition, is sure to have, not only a different conclusion about
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problems, but, what is probably more important for the philosophic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spirit, a different means of approaching them.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Writing in 1860 on the general state of philosophy, Renan pointed out,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in his Essay _La M<e9>taphysique el son Avenir_,_*_ that metaphysical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: speculation, strictly so-called, had been in abeyance for thirty
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: years, and did not seem inclined to continue the traditions of Kant,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Hegel, Hamilton and Cousin. The reasons which he gave for this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: depression of the philosophical market were, firstly, the feeling of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the impossibility of ultimate knowledge, a scepticism of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: instrument, so far as the human mind was concerned, and secondly, the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rather disdainful attitude adopted by many minds towards philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: owing to the growing importance of science--in short, the question,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "Is there any place left for philosophy; has it any _raison d'<ea>tre_?"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_: Essay published later (1876) in his _Dialogues et
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fragments philosophiques_. Cf. especially pp. 265-266.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The progress of the positive sciences, and the assertions of many that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy was futile and treacherous, led philosophy to give an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: account of itself by a kind of _apologia pro vita sua_. In the face of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: remarks akin to that of Newton's "Physics beware of metaphysics," the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: latter had to bestir itself or pass out of existence. It was, indeed,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this extinction which the more ardent and devoted scientific spirits
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
