author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: heralded, re-iterating the war-cry of Auguste Comte.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It was a crisis, in fact, for philosophy. Was it to become merely a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: universal science? Was it to abandon the task of solving the problems
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the universe by rapid intuitions and a _priori_ constructions and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: undertake the construction of a science of the whole, built up from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the data and results of the science of the parts--_i.e._, the separate
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sciences of nature? Was there, then, to be no place for metaphysics in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this classification of the sciences to which the current of thought
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was tending with increasing impetuosity? Was a science of primary or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ultimate truths a useless chimera, to be rejected entirely by the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: human mind in favour of an all-sufficing belief in positive science?
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: These were the questions which perplexed the thoughtful minds of that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: time.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We shall do well, therefore, in our survey of the half century before
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: us, to investigate the two problems which were stressed by Renan in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the essay we have quoted, for his acute mind possessed a unique power
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of sensing the feeling and thought of his time. Our preliminary task
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: will be the examination of the general attitude to knowledge adopted
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by the various thinkers and schools of thought, following this by an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: inquiry into the attitude adopted to science itself and its relation
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to philosophy.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: I
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: With these considerations in mind, let us examine the three currents
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of thought in our period beginning with that which is at once a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: prolongation of positivism and a transformation of it, a current
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: expressed in the work of Vacherot, Taine and Renan.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Etienne Vacherot (1809-1897) was partially a disciple of Victor Cousin
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and a representative also of the positivist attitude to knowledge. His
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work, however, passed beyond the bounds indicated by these names. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: remained a convinced naturalist and believer in positive science, but,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unlike Comte, he did not despise metaphysical inquiry, and he sought
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to find a place for it in thought. Vacherot, who had won a reputation
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for himself by an historical work on the Alexandrian School, became
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tne director of the Ecole Normale Sup<e9>rieure, an important position in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the intellectual world. He here advocated the doctrines by which he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sought to give a to metaphysics. His most important book, _La
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: M<e9>taphysique et la Science_, in three volumes, appeared in 1858. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: suffered imprisonment the following year for His liberal principles
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: under the Empire which had already deprived him of his position at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Sorbonne.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The general attitude to knowledge adopted by Vacherot recalls in some
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: respects the metaphysical doctrines of Spinoza, and he endeavours to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: combine the purely naturalistic view of the world with a metaphysical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: conception. The result is a profound and, for Vacherot, irreconcilable
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dualism, in which the real and the ideal are set against one another
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in rigorous contrast, and the gap between them is not bridged or even
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attempted to be filled up, as, at a later date, was the task assumed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by Fouillee in his philosophy of _id<e9>es-forces_. For Vacherot the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: world is a unity, eternal and infinite, but lacking perfection.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Perfection, the ideal, is incompatible with reality. The real is not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: at all ideal, and the ideal has no reality._*_ In this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unsatisfactory dualism Vacherot leaves us. His doctrine, although
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: making a superficial appeal by its seeming positivism on the one hand,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and its maintenance of the notion of the ideal or perfection on the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: other, is actually far more paradoxical than that which asserts that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ultimately it is the ideal only which is real. While St. Anselm had
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: endeavoured to establish by his proof of the existence of God the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reality of perfection, Vacherot, by a reversal of this proof, arrives
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: at the opposite conclusion, and at a point where it seems that it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: would be for the ideal an imperfection to exist. The absolute
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: existence of all things is thus separated from the ideal, and no
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attempt is made to relate the two, as Spinoza had so rigorously done,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by maintaining that reality _is_ perfection._/-_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_: It is interesting to contrast this with the attitude of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the new spiritualists, especially Fouill<e9>e's conception of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idees-forces, of ideas and ideals realising themselves. See also
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Guyau's attitude.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "_L'id<e9>al n'est-il pas, sur la terre o<f9> nous sommes
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Plus f<e9>cond et plus beau que la r<e9>alit<e9>?"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: --Illusion f<e9>conde_.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : Vacherot contributed further to the thought of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: time, notably by a book on religion, 1869, and later in life seems to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: have become sympathetic to the New Spiritualism, on which he also
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: wrote a book in 1884.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The influence of Vacherot was in some measure continued in that of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pupil, Hippolyte Taine (1828-1893), a thinker who had considerable
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influence upon the development of thought in our period. His ability
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as a critic of art and literature was perhaps more marked than his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: purely philosophical influence, but this is, nevertheless, important,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and cannot be overlooked.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Taine was a student of the Ecole Normale, and in 1851 was appointed to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: teach philosophy at Nevers. The _coup d'<e9>tat_, however, changed his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: career, and he turned to literature as his main field, writing a work
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: on La Fontaine for his doctorate in 1853. In the year of Comte's death
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1857) Taine published his book, _Les Philosophes fran<e7>ais du XIXe
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Si<e8>cle_, in which he turned his powerful batteries of criticism upon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the vague spiritualism professed by Cousin and officially favoured in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: France at that time._*_ By his adverse criticism of Cousin and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Eclectic School, Taine placed his influence upon the side of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positivist followers of Comte. It would, however, be erroneous to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: regard him as a mere disciple of Comte, as Taine's positivism was in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: its general form a wider doctrine, yet more rigorously scientific in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: some respects than that of Comte. There was also an important
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: difference in their attitude to metaphysics. Taine upheld strongly the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: value, and, indeed, the necessity, of a metaphysical doctrine. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: never made much of any debt or allegiance to Comte.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : See his chapter xii. on "The Success of Eclecticism,"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pp. 283-307. Cousin, he criticises at length; De Biran, Royer-Collard
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Jouffroy are included in his censures. We might mention that this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: book was first issued in the form of articles in the _Revue de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: l'Instruction publique_ during the years 1855, 1856.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In 1860 a volume dealing with the _Philosophy of Art_ appeared from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his pen, in which he not only endeavoured to relate the art of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: period to the general environment in which it arose, but, in addition,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he dealt with certain psychological aspects of the problem. Largely as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a result of the talent displayed in this work, he was ap-* *pointed in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1864 to tne chair of the History of Art and <c6>sthetics in the Ecole des
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Beaux-Arts.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Taine's interest in philosophy, and especially in psychological
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problems, was more prominently demon strated in his book _De
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: l'Intelligence_, the two volumes of which appeared in 1870. In this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work he takes a strict view of the human intelligence as a mechanism,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the workings of which he sets forth in a precise and cold manner. His
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: treatment of knowledge is akin, in some respects, to the doctrines of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the English Utilitarian and Evolutionary School as represented by John
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Stuart Mill, Bain and Spencer. The main feature of the Darwinian
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrine is set by Taine in the foreground of epistemology. There is,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: according to him, "a struggle for existence" in the realm of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: individual consciousness no less than in the external world. This
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: inner conflict is between psychical elements which, when victorious,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: result in sense-perception. This awareness, or _hallucination vraie_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is not knowledge of a purely speculative character; it is (as, at a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: later date, Bergson was to maintain in his doctrine of perception)
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: essentially bound up with action, with the instinct and mechanism of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: movement.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: One of the most notable features of Taine's work is his attitude to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychology. He rejects absolutely the rather scornful attitude adopted
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with regard to this science by Comte; at the same time he shatters the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: flimsy edifice of the eclectics in order to lay the foundation of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: scientific psychology. "The true and independent psychology is," he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: remarks, "a magnificent science which lays the foundation of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy of history, which gives life to physiology and opens up the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pathway to metaphysics."_*_ Our debt to Taine is immense, for he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: initiated the great current of experimental psychology for which his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: country has since become famous. It is not our intention in this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: present work to follow out in any detail the purely psychological work
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the period. Psychology has more and more become differentiated
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: from, and to a large degree, independent of, philosophy in a strictly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: metaphysical meaning of that word. Yet we shall do well in passing to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: note that through Taine's work the scientific attitude to psychologv
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and its many problems was taken up and developed by Ribot, whose study
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of English Psychology appeared in the same year as Taine's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: _Intelligence_. Particularly by his frequent illustrations drawn from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: abnormal psychology, Taine "set the tone" for contemporary and later
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: study of mental activity of this type. Ribot's later books have been
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mainly devoted to the study of "the abnormal,"and his efforts are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: characteristic of the labours of the Paris School, comprising Charcot,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Paulhan, Binet and Janet._*_ French psychology has in consequence
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: become a clearly defined "school," with characteristics peculiar to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: itself which distinguish it at once from the psychophysical research
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of German workers and from the analytic labours of English
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychologists. Its debt to Taine at the outset must not be forgotten.

text: The War and the subsequent course of events in France seemed to deepen
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the sadness and pessimism of Taine's character. He described himself
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as _naturellement triste_, and finally his severe positivism developed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: into a rigorous stoicism akin to that of Marcus Aurelius and Spinoza.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This attitude of mind coloured his unfinished historical work, _Les
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Origines de la France contemporaine_, upon which he was engaged for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the last years of his life (1876-1894). It may be noticed for its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: bearing upon the study of sociological problems which it indirectly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: encouraged. Just as Taine had regarded a work of art as the product of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: social environment, so he looks upon historical events. This history
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: bears all the marks of Taine's rigid, positive philosophy, intensified
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by his later stoicism. The Revolution of 1789 is treated in a cold and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: stern manner devoid of enthusiasm of any sort. He could not make
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: historical narrative live like Michelet, and from his own record the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Revolution itself is almost unintelligible. For Taine, however, we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: must remember, human nature is absolutely the product of race,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: environment and history._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_: Michelet (1798-1874), mentioned here as an historian of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a type entirely different from Taine, influenced philosophic thought
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by his volumes _Le Peuple_, 1846; _L'Amour_, 1858; _Le Pr<ea>tre, La
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Femme et la Famille_, 1859; and _La Bible de l'Humanit<e9>_, 1864. He and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his friend Quinet (1803-1875), who was also a Professor at the College
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: de France, and was the author of _G<e9>nie des Religions_, 1842, had
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: considerable influence prior to 1848 of a political and religious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: character. They were in strong opposition to the Roman Catholic Church
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and had keen controversies with the Jesuits and Ultramontanists.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In the philosophy of Taine various influences are seen at work
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: interacting. The spirit of the French thinkers of the previous
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: century--sensualists and ideologists--reappears in him. While in a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: measure he fluctuates between naturalism and idealism, the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: predominating tone of his work is clearly positivist. He was a great
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: student of Spinoza and of Hegel, and the influence of both these
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thinkers appears in his work. Like Spinoza, he believes in a universal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: determination; like Hegel, he asserts the real and the rational to be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: identical. In his general attitude to the problems of knowledge Taine
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: criticises and passes beyond the standpoints of both Hume and Kant. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: opposes the purely empiricist schools of both France and England. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: purely empirical attitude which looks upon the world as fragmentary
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and phenomenal is deficient, according to Taine, and is, moreover,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: incompatible with the notion of necessity. This notion of necessity is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: characteristic of Taine's whole work, and his strict adherence to it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was mainly due to his absolute belief in science and its methods,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which is a mark of all the positivist type of thought.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: While he rejected Hume's empiricism he also opposed the doctrines of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Kant and the neo-critical school which found its inspiration in Kant
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Hume. Taine asserted that it is possible to have a knowledge of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: things in their objective reality, and he appears to have based his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: epistemology upon the doctrine of analysis proposed by Condillac.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Taine disagreed with the theory of the relativity of human knowledge
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and with the phenomenal basis of the neo-critical teaching, its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rejection of "the thing in itself." He believed we had knowledge not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: merely relative but absolute, and he claimed that we can pass from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: phenomena and their laws to comprehend the essence of things in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: themselves. He endeavours to avoid the difficulties of Hume by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dogmatism. While clinging to a semi-Hegelian view of rationality he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: avoids Kant's critical attitude to reason itself. We have in Taine not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a critical rationalist but a dogmatic rationalist. While the rational
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: aspect of his thought commands a certain respect and has had in many
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: directions a very wholesome influence, notably, as we have remarked,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upon psychology, yet it proves itself in the last analysis
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: self-contradictory, for a true rationalism is critical in character
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rather than dogmatic.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In Taine'a great contemporary, Ernest Renan (1823-1892), a very
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: different temper is seen. The two thinkers both possessed popularity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as men of letters, and resembled one another in being devoted to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: literary and historical pursuits rather than to philosophy itself.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renan was trained for the priesthood of the Roman Catholic Church. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: has left us a record of his early life in _Souvenirs d'Enfance et de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Jeunesse_. We there have an autobiography of a sincere and sensitive
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: soul, encouraged in his priestly career by his family and his teachers
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to such a degree that he had conceived of no other career for himself,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: until at the age of twenty, under the influence of modern scientific
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrines and the criticism of the Biblical records, he found himself
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: an unbeliever, certainly not a Roman Catholic, and not, in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ordinary interpretation of that rather vague term, a Christian. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: harsh, unrelenting dogmatism of the Roman Church drove Renan from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Christianity. We find him remarking that had he lived in a Protestant.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: country he might not have been faced with the dilemma._*_ A _via
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: media_ might have presented itself in one of the very numerous forms
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: into which Protestant Christianity, is divided. He might have
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: exercised in such a sphere, his priestly functions as did
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Schleiermacher. Renan's break with Rome emphasises the clear-cut
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: division which exists in France between the Christian faith
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (represented, almost entirely by the Roman Church) and _libre-pens<e9>e_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a point which will claim our attention later, when we come to treat of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Philosophy of Religion.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Cf. his _Souvenirs d'Enfance et de Jeunesse_, p. 292.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Having abandoned the seminary and the Church, Renan worked for his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: university degrees. The events of 1848-49 inspired his young heart
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with great enthusiasm, under the influence of which he wrote his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Avenir de la Science_. This book was not published, however, until
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1890, when he had lost his early hopes and illusions. In 1849 he went
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: away upon a mission to Italy. "The reaction of 1850-51 and the _coup
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: d'<e9>tat_ instilled into me a pessimism of which I am not yet cured," so
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he wrote in the preface to his _Dialogues et Fragments
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophiques_._*_ Some years after the _coup d'<e9>tat_ he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: published a volume of essays (_Essais de Morale et de Critique_), and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he showed his acquaintance with Arabic philosophy by an excellent
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: treatise on _Averroes et l'Averroisme_ (1859). The following year he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: visited Syria and, in 1861, was appointed Professor of Hebrew at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Coll<e8>ge de France. He then began his monumental work on _Les Origines
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: du Christianisme_, of which the first volume, _La Vie de J<e9>sus_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: appeared in 1863. Its importance for religious thought we shall
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: consider in our last chapter; here it must suffice to observe its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: immediate consequences. These were terrific onslaughts from the clergy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upon its author, which, although they brought the attention of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: countrymen and of the world upon Renan, resulted in the Imperial
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Government suspending his tenure of the chair. After the fall of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Empire, however, he returned to it, and under the Third Republic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: became Director of the Coll<e8>ge de France.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Published only in 1895. The preface referred to is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dated 1871.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renan, although he broke off his career in the Church and his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: connection with organised religion, retained, nevertheless, much of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the priestly character all his life, and he himself confesses this: "I
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: have learned several things, but I have changed in nowise as to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: general system of intellectual and moral life. My habitation has
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: become more spacious, but it still stands on the same ground. I look
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upon my estrangement from orthodoxy as only a change of opinion
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: concerning an important historical question, a change which does not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: prevent me from dwelling on the same foundations as before." He indeed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: found it impossible to reconcile the Catholic faith with free and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: honest thought. His break with the Church made him an enemy of all
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: superstition, and his writings raised against him the hatred of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Catholic clergy, who regarded him as a deserter. In the cus-* *tomary
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: terms of heated theological debate he was styled an atheist. This was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: grossly unfair or meaningless. Which word we use here depends upon our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: definition of theism. As a matter of fact, Renan was one of the most
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: deeply religious minds of his time. His early religious sentiments
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: remained, in essence if not in form, with him throughout his life.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: These were always associated with the tender memories he had of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mother and beloved sister and his virtuous teachers, the priests in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the little town of Brittany, whence he came. Much of the Breton
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mysticism clung to his soul, and much of his philosophy is a restated,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rationalised form of his early beliefs.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: As a figure in the intellectual life of the time, Renan is difficult
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to estimate. The very subtilty of his intellect betrayed him into an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: oscillation which was far from admirable, and prevented his countrymen
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in his own day from "getting to grips" with his ideas. These were
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: kaleidoscopic. Renan seems a type, reflecting many tendencies of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: time, useful as an illustration to the historian of the ideas of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: period; but for philosophy in the special sense he has none of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: clearly defined importance of men like Renouvier, Lachelier, Guyau,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fouill<e9>e, Bergson or Blondel. His humanism keeps him free from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dogmatism, but his mind fluctuates so that his general attitude to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ultimate problems is one of reserve, of scepticism and of frequent
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: paradox and contradiction. Renan seems to combine the positivist scorn
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of metaphysics with the Kantian idealism. At times, however, his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attitude is rather Hegelian, and he believes in universal change which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is an evolving of spirit, the ideal or God, call it what we will. We
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: need not be too particular about names or forms of thought, for, after
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: all, everything "may be only a dream." That is Renan's attitude, to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: temper enthusiasm by irony, to assert a duty of doubt, and often,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: perhaps, to gain a literary brilliance by contradictory statements.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "The survey of human affairs is not complete," he reminds us, "unless
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: we allot a place for irony beside that of tears, a place for pity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: beside that of rage, and a place for a smile alongside respect."_*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_: Preface to his _Drames philosophiques_, 1888.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It was this versatility which made Renan a lover of the philosophic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dialogue. This literary and dramatic form naturally appealed strongly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to a mind who was so very conscious of the fact that the truths with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which philosophy deals cannot be directly denied or directly affirmed,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as they are not subject to demonstration. All the high problems of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: humanity Renan recognised as being of this kind, as involving finally
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a rational faith; and he claimed that the best we can do is to present
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the problems of life from different points of view. This is due
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: entirely to the peculiar character of philosophy itself, and to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: distinction, which must never be overlooked, between knowledge and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: belief, between certitude and opinion. Geometry, for example, is not a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: subject for dialogues but for demonstration, as it involves knowledge
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and certitude. The problems of philosophy, on the contrary, involve
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "_une nuance de foi_," as Renan styles it. They involve willed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: adhesion, acceptance or choice; they provoke sympathy or hate, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: call into play human personality with its varying shades of colour.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This state of _nuance_ Renan asserts to be the one of the hour for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy. It is not the time, he thinks, to attempt to strengthen by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: abstract reasoning the "proofs" of God's existence or of the reality
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of a future life. "Men see just now that they can never know anything
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the supreme cause of the universe or of their own destiny.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Nevertheless they are anxious to listen to those who will speak to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: them about either."_/-_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_: From his Preface to Drames philosophiques.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Knowledge, Renan maintained, lies somewhere between the two schools
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: into which the majority of men are divided. "What you are looking for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: has long since been discovered and made clear," say the orthodox.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "What you are looking for is impossible to find," say the practical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positivists, the political "raillers" and the atheists. It is true
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that we shall never know the ultimate secret of all being, but we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: shall never prevent man from desiring more and more knowledge or from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: creating for himself working hypotheses or beliefs.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Yet although Renan admits this truth he never approaches even the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pragmatist position of supporting "creative beliefs." He rather urges
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a certain passivity towards problems and opinions. We should, he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: argues in his _Examen de Conscience philosophique_,_*_ let them
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work themselves out in us. Like a spectator we must let them modify
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: our "intellectual retina"; we must let reality reflect itself in us.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: By this he does not mean to assert that the truth about that reality
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is a matter of pure indifference to us-far from it. Precisely because
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he is so conscious of the importance of true knowledge, he is anxious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that we should approach the study of reality without previous
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: prejudices. "We have no right," he remarks, "to have a desire when
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reason speaks; we must listen and nothing more." [Footnote: Feuilles
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: d<e9>tach<e9>es, p. 402.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_: In his _Feuilles detach<e9>es_, pp. 401-443.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It must be admitted, however, that Renan's attitude to the problems of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: knowledge was largely sceptical. While, as we shall see in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: following chapter, he extolled science, his attitude to belief and to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: knowledge was irritating in its vagueness and changeableness. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: appeared to pose too much as a _dilettante_ making a show of subtle
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intellect, rather than a serious thinker of the first rank. His
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: eminence and genius are unquestioned, but he played in a bewitching
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and frequently bewildering manner with great and serious problems, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: one cannot help wishing that this great intellect of his--and it was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unquestionably great--was not more steady and was not applied by its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: owner more steadfastly and courageously to ultimate problems. His
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: writings reflect a bewildering variety of contradictory moods,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: playful, scathing, serious and mocking. Indeed, he replied in his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Feuilles detach<e9>es_ (1892) to the accusations of Amiel by insisting
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that irony is the philosopher's last word. For him as for his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: brilliant fellow-countryman, Anatole France, ironical scepticism is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the ultimate product of his reflection upon life. His _Examen de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Conscience_ philosophique is his Confession of Faith, written four
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: years before his death, in which he tries to defend his sceptical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attitude and to put forward scepticism as an apology for his own
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: uncertainty and his paradoxical changes of view. Irony intermingles
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with his doubt here too. We do not know, he says, ultimate reality; we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: do not know whether there be any purpose or end in the universe at
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: all. There may be, but on the other hand it may be a farce and fiasco.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: By refusing to believe in anything, rejecting both alternatives, Renan
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: argues, with a kind of mental cowardice, we avoid the consequence of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: being absolutely deceived. He recommended an adoption of mixed belief
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and doubt, optimism and irony.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This is a surprising attitude in a philosopher and is not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: characteristic of great modern thinkers, most of whom prefer belief
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (hypothetical although that be) to non-belief. Doubtless Renan's early
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: training had a psychological effect which operated perhaps largely
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unconsciously throughout his life, and his literary and linguistic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ability seems to have given him a reputation which was rather that of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a man of letters than a philosopher. He had not the mental strength or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: frankness to face alternatives squarely and to decide to adopt one.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Consequently he merited the application of the old proverb about being
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: between two stools. This application was actually made to Renan's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attitude in a critical remark by Renouvier in his _Esquisse d'une
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Classification des Doctrines philosphiques_._*_ Renouvier had no
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: difficulty in pointing out that the man who hesitates deprives himself
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of that great reality, the exercise of his own power of free choice,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in itself valuable and more akin to reality (whatever be the choice)
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: than a mere "sitting on the fence," an attitude which, so far from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: assuring one of getting the advantages of both possibilities as Renan
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: claims, may more justly seem to deprive one of the advantages in both
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: directions. The needs of life demand that we construct beliefs of some
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sort. We may be wrong and err, but pure scepticism such as Renan
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: advocated is untenable. Life, if it is to be real and earnest, demands
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of us that we have faith in _some_ values, that we construct _some_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: beliefs, _some_ hypotheses, by which we may work.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote: Vol. ii., p. 395.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Both Renan and Taine exercised a considerable influence upon French
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought. While inheriting the positivist outlook they, to a great
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: degree, perhaps unconsciously, undermined the positive position, both
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by their interest in the humanities, in art, letters and religion and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in their metaphysical attitude. Taine, beginning with a rigid
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: naturalism, came gradually to approach an idealistic standpoint in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: many respects, while Renan, beginning with a dogmatic idealism, came
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to acute doubt, hypotheses, "dreams" and scepticism. Taine kept his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thoughts in too rigid a mould, solidified, while those of Renan seem
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: finally to have existed only in a gaseous state, intangible, vague and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: hazy. We have observed how the positivist current from Comte was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: carried over by Vacherot to Taine. In Renan we find that current
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: present also, but it has begun to turn against itself. While we may
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: say that his work reflects in a very remarkable manner the spirit of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his time, especially the positivist faith in science, yet we are also
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: able to find in it, in spite of his immense scepticism, the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: indications of a spiritualist or idealist movement, groping and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: shaping itself as the century grows older.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: II
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: While the positivist current of thought was working itself out through
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Vacherot, Taine and Renan to a position which forms a connecting link
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: between Comte and the new spiritualism in which the reaction against
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positivism and eclecticism finally culminated, another influence was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: making itself felt independently in the neo-critical philosophy of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We must here note the work and influence of Cournot (1801-1877), which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: form a very definite link between the doctrines of Comte and those of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier. He owed much to positivism, and he contributed to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: formation of neo-criticism by his influence upon Renouvier. Cournot's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Essai sur le Fondement de nos Connaissances_ appeared in 1851, three
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: years before Renouvier gave to the world the first volume of his
