title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Essais de Critique g<e9>n<e9>rale_. In 1861 Cournot published his _Trait<e9>
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: de l'Encha<ee>nement des Id<e9>es_, which was followed by his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Considerations sur le Marche des Id<e9>es_ (1872) and _Mat<e9>rialisme_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Vitalisme_, _Rationalisme_ (1875). These volumes form his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: contribution to philosophical thought, his remaining works being
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mainly concerned with political economy and mathematics, a science in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which he won distinction.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Like Comte, Cournot opposed the spiritualism, the eclecticism and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychology of Cousin, but he was possessed of a more philosophic mind
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: than Comte; he certainly had greater philosophical knowledge, was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: better equipped in the history of philosophy and had much greater
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: respect for metaphysical theory. He shared with Comte, however, an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: interest in social problems and biology; he also adopted his general
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attitude to knowledge, but the spirit of Cournot's work is much less
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dogmatic than that of the great positivist, and he made no pretensions
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to be a "pontiff" such as Comte aspired to be. Indeed his lack of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pretensions may account partly for the lack of attention with which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his work (which is shrewd, thoughtful and reserved) has been treated.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: He aimed at indicating the foundations of a sound philosophy rather
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: than at offering a system of thought to the public. This temper was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the product of his scientific attitude. It was by an examination of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the sciences and particularly of the principles upon which they depend
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that he formulated his group of fundamental doctrines.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: He avoided hasty generalisations or a _priori_ constructions and, true
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the scientific spirit, based his thought upon the data afforded by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: experience. He agreed heartily with Comte regarding the relativity of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: our knowledge. An investigation of this knowledge shows it to be based
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: on three principles--order, chance, and probability. We find order
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: existing in the universe and by scientific methods we try to grasp
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this order. This involves induction, a method which cannot give us
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: absolute certainty, although it approximates to it. It gives us
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: probability only. There is therefore a reality of chances, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: contingency or chance must be admitted as a factor in evolution and in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: human history.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Cournot foreshadows many of the doctrines of the new spiritualists as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: well as those of the neo-critical school. Much in his work heralds a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson as well as a Renouvier. This is noticeable in his attitude to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: science and to the problem of contingency or freedom. It is further
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: seen in his doctrine that the _vivant_ is incapable of demonstration,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in his view of the soul or higher instinct which he distinguished from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the intelligence, in the biological interest displayed in his work
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (due partly to the work of Bichat_*_), and in his idea of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Travail de Cr<e9>ation_. Unlike Bergson, however, he admits a teleology,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for he believed this inseparable from living beings, but he regards it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as a hazardous finality, not rigid or inconsistent with freedom.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Bichat (1771-1802) was a noted physiologist and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: anatomist. In 1800 appeared his _Recherches physiologiques sur la Vie
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: et la Mort_, followed in 1801 by _Anatomie g<e9>n<e9>rale, appliqu<e9>e <e0> la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Physiologie et <e0> la M<e9>decine_.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The immediate influence of Cournot was felt by only a small circle,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and his most notable affinity was with Renouvier, although Cournot was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: less strictly an intellectualist. Like Renouvier he looked upon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy as a "_Critique g<e9>n<e9>rale_." He was also concerned with the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problem of the categories and with the compatibility of science and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: freedom, a problem which was now assuming a very central position in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the thought of the period.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier, in the construction of his philosophy, was partly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influenced by the work of Cournot. In this lone, stern, indefatigable
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: worker we have one of the most powerful minds of the century. Charles
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier shares with Auguste Comte the first honours of the century
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in France so far as philosophical work is concerned. Curiously enough
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he came from Comte's birth-place, Montpellier. When Renouvier was born
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in 1815, seventeen years later than Comte, the great positivist was in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his second year of study at the Ecole Polytechnique in Paris. To this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: great scientific and mathematical institution came Renouvier, to find
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte as _R<e9>p<e9>titeur_ of Higher Mathematics. He was not only a keen
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: student of the mathematical sciences but also an ardent follower of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Saint-Simon, and although in later life he lost many of the hopes of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his youth the Saint-Simon spirit remained with him, and he retained a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: keen interest in social ethics and particularly in the ideas of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fourier, Proudhon and Blanc. At the Ecole he met as fellow-pupils
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Jules Lequier and Felix Ravaisson.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Instead of entering the civil service Renouvier then applied himself
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to philosophy and political science, influenced undoubtedly by Comte's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work. The year 1848, which saw the second attempt to establish a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: republic, gave Renouvier, now a zealous republican, an opportunity,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and he issued his _Manuel r<e9>publicain de l'Homme et du Citoyen_. This
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: volume, intended for schoolmasters, had the approval of Carnot,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Minister of Education to the Provisionary Government. Its socialist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrines were so criticised by the Chamber of 1849 that Carnot, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with him the Government, fell from power. Renouvier went further in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his _Gouvernement direct et Organisation communale et centrale de la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: R<e9>publique_, in which he collaborated with his socialist friends in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: outlining a scheme of communism, making the canton a local power, a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: scheme which contained the germ-idea of the Soviet of Bolshevik
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Russia. Such ideas were, however, far too advanced for the France of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that date and their proposal did more harm than good to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: progressive party by producing a reaction in wavering minds.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier, through the paper _Libert<e9> de penser_, launched attacks
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upon the policy of the Presidency, and began in the _Revue
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophique_ a serial _Uchronie_, a novel of a political and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophical character. It was never finished. Suddenly, like a bolt
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: from the blue, came, on December and, the _coup d'<e9>tat_. The effect of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this upon Renouvier was profound. Disgusted at the power of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: monarchy, the shattering of the republican hopes, the suppression of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: liberty and the general reaction, he abandoned political life
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: entirely. What politics lost, however, philosophy has gained, for he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: turned his acute mind with its tremendous energy to the study of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problems of the universe.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Three years after the _coup d'<e9>tat_, in the same year in which Comte
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: completed his _Syst<e8>me de Politique_ positive, 1854, Renouvier
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: published the first volume of his _magnum opus_, the _Essais de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Critique g<e9>n<e9>rale_._*_ The appearance of this work is a notable
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: date in the development of modern French philosophy. The problems
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: therein discussed will concern us in later chapters. Here we must
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: point out the indefatigable labour given to this work by Renouvier.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The writing and revision of these essays covered almost the whole of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the half century, concluding in 1897. In their first, briefer form
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: they occupied the decade 1854-64, and consisted of four volumes only,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which on revision became finally thirteen._*_ These Essays range
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: over Logic, Psychology, the Philosophy of the Sciences and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Philosophy of History.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : It is interesting for the comparative study of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought of the century to observe that the great work of Lotze in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Germany, _Mikrocosmos_, was contemporaneous with the _Essais_ of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier. Lotze's three volumes appeared in 1856, 1858 and 1864. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Logik_ and _Metaphysik_ of Lotze should also be compared with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier's _Essais_. Further comparison or contrast may be made with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reference to the _Logic_ of both Bradley and Bosanquet in England.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Since 1912 the _Essais de Critique g<e9>n<e9>rale_ are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: available in ten volumes, owing to the publications of new editions of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the first three Essays by A. Colin in five volumes. For details of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: original and revised publication of the work, see our Bibliography,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: under Renouvier (pp. 334-335).]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Having thus laid the foundations of his own throught, Renouvier, in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: conjunction with his scholarly friend Pillon, undertook the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: publication of a monthly periodical, _L'Ann<e9>e philosophique_, to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: encourage philosophic thought in France. This appeared first in 1867,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the same year in which Ravaisson laid the foundations of the new
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualism by his celebrated _Rapport_. In 1869 Renouvier published
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his noteworthy treatise upon Ethics, in two volumes, _La Science de la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Morale_.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The war of 1870 brought his monthly periodical to an untimely end. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: conclusion of the war in 1871 resulted in the establishment, for the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: third time, of a republic, which in spite of many vicissitudes has
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: continued even to this day. With the restoration of peace and of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: republic, Renouvier felt encouraged to undertake the ambitious scheme
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of publishing a weekly paper, not only philosophical in character but
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: political, literary and religious. He desired ardently to address his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: countrymen at a time when they were rather intellectually and morally
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: bewildered. He felt he had something constructive to offer, and hoped
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that the "new criticism," as he called it, might become the philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the new republic. Thus was founded, in 1872, the famous _Critique
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophique_, which aimed primarily at the consolidation of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: republic politically and morally,_/-_ This paper appeared as a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: weekly from its commencement until 1884,then continued for a further
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: five years as a monthly. Renouvier and his friend Pillon were assisted
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by other contributors, A. Sabatier, L. Dauriac, R. Allier, who were
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: more or less disciples of the neo-critical school. Various articles
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: were contributed by William James, who had a great admiration for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier. The two men, although widely different in temperament and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: method, had certain affinities in their doctrine of truth and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: certitude._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : In the early numbers, political articles, as was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: natural in the years following 1871, were prominent. Among these early
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: articles we may cite the one, "Is France morally obliged to carry out
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: the terms of the Treaty imposed upon her by Prussia?"]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : On this relationship see James's _Will to Believe_, p.

author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 143, 1897, and the dedications in his _Some Problems of Philosophy_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (to Renouvier), and his _Principles of Psychology_ (to Pillon), also
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: _Letters of William James_, September i8th, 1892.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier's enthusiasm for his periodical did not, however, abate his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: energy or ardour for more lasting work. He undertook the task of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: revising and augmenting his great work, the _Essais de Critique
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: g<e9>n<e9>rale_, and added to the series another (fifth) Essay, in four
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: volumes. He also issued in 1876 the curious work _Uchronie_, a history
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of "what might have been" (in his view) the development of European
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: civilisation. Together with Pillon he translated _Hume's Treatise on
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Human Nature_.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Meanwhile the _Critique philosophique_ continued to combat any
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: symptoms of a further _coup d'<e9>tat_, and "to uphold strictly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: republican principles and to fight all that savoured of Caesar or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: imperialism." In 1878 a quarterly supplement _La Critique religieuse_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was added to attack the Roman Catholic Church and to diminish its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: power in France._/-_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with in our last chapter.]

author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: philosophiques_ in 1885 in two volumes, the second of which contained

author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: His thought assumed a slightly new form towards the close of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: century, at the end of which he published, in conjunction with his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: title _La Nouvelle Monadologie_, and method it reveals the influence
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Leibnitz.

author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The close of the century shows us Renouvier as an old man, still an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: enormous worker, celebrating his eighty-sixth birthday by planning and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: writing further volumes (_Les Dilemmes de la M<e9>taphysique pure_ and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: its sequel, _Histoire et Solution des Probl<e8>mes m<e9>taphysiques_). This
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "grand old man" of modern French philosophy lived on into the early
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: years of the twentieth century, still publishing, still writing to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: last. His final volume, _Le Personnalisme_, was a restatement of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy, issued when he was in his eighty-ninth year. He died "in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: harness" in 1903, dictating to his friend Prat a _r<e9>sum<e9>_ of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought on important points and leaving an unpublished work on the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy of Kant._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: followed in 1906.]

author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier's career is a striking one and we have sketched it somewhat
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: fully here because of its showing more distinctly than that of Taine
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: or Renan the reflections of contemporary history upon the thinking
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: minds who lived through the years 1848-51 and 1870-71. Renouvier was a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: young spirit in the year of the revolution, 1848, and lived right on
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: through the _coup d'<e9>tat_, the Second Empire, the Franco-Prussian War,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Commune, the Third Republic, and he foresaw and perhaps influenced
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Republic's attitude to the Roman Church. His career is the most
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: significant and enlightening one to follow of all the thinkers who
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: come within our period. Let us note that he never held any academic or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: public teaching appointment. His life was in the main a secluded one
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and, like Comte, he found the University a limited preserve closed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: against him and his philosophy, dominated by the declining eclecticism
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which drew its inspiration from Cousin. Only gradually did his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influence make itself felt to such a degree that the University was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: compelled to take notice of it. Now his work is more appreciated, but
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: not as much as it might be, and outside his own country he is little
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: known. The student finds his writings somewhat difficult owing to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: author's heavy style. He has none of the literary ease and brilliance
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of a Renan. But his work was great and noble, animated by a passion
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for truth and a hatred of philosophical "shams" and a current of deep
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: moral earnestness colours all his work. He had considerable power as a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: critic, for the training of the Ecole Polytechnique produced a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: strictly logical temper in his work, which is that of a true
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosopher, not that of a merely brilliant _litterateur_ or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _dilettante_, and he must be regarded as one of the intellectual
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: giants of the century.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: While we see in Positivism a system of thought which opposed itself to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Eclecticism, we find in the philosophy of Renouvier a system of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrine which is opposed to both Eclecticism and Positivism. Indeed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier puts up a strong mental fight against both of these systems;
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the latter he regarded as an ambitious conceit. He agreed, however,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with Comte and with Cournot upon the relativity of our knowledge. "I
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: accept," he says, "one fundamental principle of the Positivist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: School--namely, the reduction of knowledge to the laws of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: phenomena."_*_ The author of the _Essais de Critique g<e9>n<e9>rale_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: considered himself, however, to be the apostolic successor, not of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte, but of Kant. The title of _neo-criticisme__/-_ which he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: gave to his philosophy shows his affinity with the author of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Kritik der reinen Vernunft_. This is very noticeable in his method of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: treating the problem of knowledge by criticising the human mind and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: especially in his giving a preference to moral considerations._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It would be, however, very erroneous to regard Renouvier as a disciple
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Kant, for he amends and rejects many of the doctrines of the German
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosopher. We have noted the fact that he translated Hume; we must
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: observe also that Hume's influence is very strongly marked in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier's "phenomenalism."_/-_ "Renouvier is connected with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Hume," says Pillon, in the preface he contributed to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: translation,_/=_ "as much as with Kant. . . . He reconciles Hume
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Kant. . . . Something is lacking in Hume, the notion of law;
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: something is superfluous in Kant, the notion of substance. It was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: necessary to unite the phenomenalism of Hume with the a _priori_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: teaching of Kant. This was the work accomplished by Renouvier."
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Preface to Essais de Critique g<e9>n<e9>rale.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : The English word "_criticism_" is, it should be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: noted, translated in French by "_critique_" and not by the word
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "_criticisme_," a term which is used for the philosophy of the _Kritik_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Kant.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : In recognising the primacy of the moral or practical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reason in Kant, Renouvier resembles Fichte.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Renouvier's phenomenalism should be compared with that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Shadworth Hodgson, as set forth in the volumes of his large work on
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _The Metaphysic of Experience_, 1899. Hodgson has given his estimate
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Renouvier and his relationship to him in _Mind_ (volume for 1881).]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/=_ : _Psychologie de Hume : Trait<e9> de la Nature humaine_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier Pr<e9>face par Pillon, p. lxviii.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It may be doubted whether Pillon's eulogy is altogether sound in its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: approval of the "reconciliation" of Hume and Kant, for such a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reconciliation of opposites may well appear impossible. Renouvier
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: himself faced this problem of the reconciliation of opposites when at
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: an early age he inclined to follow the Hegelian philosophy, a doctrine
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which may very well be described as a "reconciliation of opposites,"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _par excellence_. Dissatisfied, however, with such a scheme Renouvier
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: came round to the Kantian standpoint and then passed beyond it to a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: position absolutely contrary to that of Hegel. This position is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: frankly that opposites cannot be reconciled, one or the other must be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rejected. Renouvier thus made the law of contradiction the basis of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his philosophy, as it is the basis of our principles of thought or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: logic.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: He rigorously applied this principle to that very interesting part of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Kant's work, the antinomies, which he held should never have been
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: formulated. The reasons put forward for this statement were two: the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: principle of contradiction and the law of number. Renouvier did not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: believe in what mathematicians call an "infinite number." He held it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to be an absurd and contradictory notion, for to be a number at all it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: must be numerical and therefore not infinite. The application of this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the Kantian antinomies, as for example to the questions, "Is space
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: infinite or finite? Had the world a beginning or not?" is interesting
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: because it treats them as Alexander did the Gordian knot. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: admission that space is infinite, or that the world had no beginning,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: involves the admission of an "infinite number," a contradiction and an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: absurdity. Since, therefore, such a number is a pure fiction we _must_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: logically conclude that space is finite,_*_ that the world had a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: beginning and that the ascending series of causes has a first term,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which admission involves freedom at the heart of things.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote: It is interesting to observe how the stress laid by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier upon the finiteness of space and upon relativity has found
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: expression in the scientific world by Einstein, long after it had been
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: expressed philosophically.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: As Renouvier had treated the antinomies of Kant, so he makes short
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work of the Kantian conception of a world of noumena (_Dinge an sich_)
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of which we know nothing, but which is the foundation of the phenomena
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: we know. Like Hume, he rejects all notion of substance, of which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Kant's noumenon is a survival from ancient times. The idea of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: substance he abhors as leading to pantheism and to fatalism, doctrines
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which Renouvier energetically opposes, to uphold man's freedom and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dignity of human personality.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In the philosophy of Kant personality was not included among the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: categories. Renouvier draws up for himself a new list of categories
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: differing from those of Kant. Beginning with Relation they culminate
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in Personality. These two categories indicate two of the strongholds
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Renouvier's philosophy. Beginning from his fundamental thesis "All
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is relative," Renouvier points out that as nothing can possibly be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: known save by or in a relation of some sort it is evident that the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: most general law of all is that of Relation itself. Relation is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: therefore the first and fundamental category embracing all the others.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Then follow, Number, Position, Succession, Quality. To these are added
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the important ones, Becoming, Causality, Finality proceeding from the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: simple to the composite, from the abstract to the concrete, from the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: elements most easily selected from our experience to that which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: embraces the experience itself, Renouvier comes to the final category
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in which they all find their consummation-Personality. The importance
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which he attaches to this category colours his entire thought and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: particularly determines his attitude to the various problems which we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: shall discuss in our following chapters.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: As we can think of nothing save in relation to consciousness and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: consequently we cannot conceive the universe apart from personality,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: our knowledge of the universe, our philosophies, our beliefs are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "personal" constructions. But they need not be on that account merely
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: subjective and individualistic in character, for they refer to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: personality in its wide sense, a sense shared by other persons. This
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: has important consequences for the problem of certitude in knowledge
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Renouvier has here certain affinities to the pragmatist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: standpoint.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: His discussion of certitude is very closely bound up with his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: treatment of the problem of freedom, but we may indicate here
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier's attitude to Belief and Knowledge, a problem in which he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was aided by the work of his friend Jules Lequier,_*_ whom he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: quotes in his second _Essai de Critique g<e9>n<e9>rale_. Renouvier considers
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it advisable to approach the problem of certitude by considering its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: opposite, doubt. In a famous passage in his second _Essai_ he states
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the circumstances under which we do not doubt--namely, "when we see,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: when we know, when we believe." Owing to our liability to error (even
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: seeing is not believing, and we frequently change our minds even about
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: our "seeing"), it appears that belief is always involved, and more
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: correctly "we believe that we see, we believe that we know." Belief is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a state of consciousness involved in a certain affirmation of which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the motives show themselves as adequate. Certitude arises when the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: possibility of an affirmation of the contrary is entirely rejected by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the mind. Certitude thus appears as a kind of belief. All knowledge,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier maintains, involves an affirmation of will. It is here we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: see the contrast so strongly marked between him and Renan, who wished
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: us to "let things think themselves out in us." "Every affirmation in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which consciousness is reflective is subordinated, in consciousness,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the determination to affirm." Our knowledge, our certitude, our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: belief, whatever we prefer to call it, is a construction not purely
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intellectual but involving elements of feeling and, above all, of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: will. Even the most logically incontrovertible truth are sometimes
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unconvincing. This is because certitude is not purely intellectual; it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is _une affaire passionnelle_._*_ Renouvier here not only
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: approaches the pragmatist position, but he recalls the attitude to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: will, assumed by Maine de Biran. For the Cartesian formula De Biran
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: had suggested the substitution of _Volo, ergo sum_. The inadequacy of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the the _Cogito, ergo sum_ is remarked upon by Lequier, whose
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: treatment of the question of certainty Renouvier follows. As all
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: demonstration is deductive in character and so requires existing
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: premises, we cannot expect the _premi<e8>re v<e9>rit<e9>_ to be demonstrable.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: If, from the or certainty, we must turn to the will to create belief,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: or certainty, we must turn to the will to create beliefs_*_, for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: no evidence or previous truths exist for us. The _Cogito, ergo sum_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: really does not give us a starting point, as Descartes claimed for it,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: since there is no proper sequence from _cogito_ to _sum_. Here we have
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: merely two selves, _moi-pens<e9>e_ and _moi-objet_. We need a live spark
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to bridge this gap to unite the two into one complete living self;
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this is found in _moi-volont<e9>_, in a free act of will. This free act
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of will affirms the existence of the self by uniting in a synthetic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: judgment the thinking-self to the object-self. "I refuse," says
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier, quoting Lequier, "to follow the work of a knowledge which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: would not be mine. I accept the certainty of which I am the author."
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The _premi<e8>re v<e9>rit<e9>_ is a free personal act of faith. Certainty in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy or in science reposes ultimately upon freedom and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: consciousness of freedom.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_: Jules Lequier was born in 1814 and entered the Ecole
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: polytechnique in 1834, leaving two years later for a military staff
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: appointment. This he abandoned in 1838. He died in 1862 after having
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: destroyed most of his writings. Three Years after his death was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: published the volume, _La Recherche d'une premi<e8>re V<e9>rit<e9>, fragments
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: posthumes de Jules Lequier_. The reader should note the very
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: interesting remarks by Renouvier at the end of the first volume of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Psychologie rationnelle, 1912 ed., pp. 369-393, on Lequier and his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Philosophy, also the Fragments reprinted by Renouvier in that work,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Comment trouver, comment chercher_, vol. i., on Subject and Object
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (vol. ii.), and on Freedom.]

author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_: Lotze employs a similar phrase, eine Gem<fc>ths-sache.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Here again, as in the philosophy of Cournot, we find the main emphasis
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: falling upon the double problem of the period. It is in reality one
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problem with two aspects--the relation of science to morality, or, in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: other words, the place and significance of freedom.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The general influence of Renouvier has led to the formation of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: neo-critical "school" of thought, prominent members of which may be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cited: Pillon and Prat, his intimate friends, S<e9>ailles and Darlu, who
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: have contributed monographs upon their master's teaching, together
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with Hamelin, Liard and Brochard, eminent disciples. Hamelin
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1856-1907), whose premature and accidental death deprived France of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: keen thinker, is known for his _Essai sur les El<e9>ments principaux de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: la Repr<e9>sentation_ (1907), supplementing the doctrines of Renouvier by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: those of Hegel.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In the work of Liard (1846-1917), _La Science positive et la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: M<e9>taphysique_ (1879), we see a combination of the influence of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Vacherot, Renouvier and Kant. He was also perplexed by the problem of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: efficient and final causes as was Lachelier, whose famous thesis _De
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: l'Induction_ appeared eight years earlier. While Lachelier was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influenced by Kant, he, none the less, belongs to the current of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: new spiritualism which we shall presently examine. Liard, however, by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his adherence to many critical and neo-critical standpoints may be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: justly looked upon as belonging to that great current of which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier is the prominent thinker.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Brochard (1848-1907) is mainly known by his _treatise De l'Erreur_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1879) and his volumes on Ethics, _De la Responsabilit<e9> morale_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1876), and _De l'Universalit<e9> des Notions morales_ (1876), in all of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which the primacy of moral considerations is advocated in a tone
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: inspired by Renouvier's strong moral standpoint. The work _De l'Erreur_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: emphasises the importance of the problem of freedom as being the crux
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the whole question involved in the relation of science and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: morality. Adhering to the neo-critical doctrines in general, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: particularly to the value of the practical reason, Brochard, by his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: insistence upon action as a foundation for belief, has marked
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: affinities with the doctrines of Blondel (and Olle-Laprune), the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: significance of whose work will appear at the end of our next section.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The phenomenalism of Renouvier was followed up by two thinkers, who
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cannot, however, be regarded as belonging to his neo-critical school.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In 1888 Gourd published his work entitled _Le Ph<e9>nom<e8>ne_, which was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: followed six years later by the slightly more coherent attempt of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Boirac to base a philosophy upon the phenomenalism which expresses
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: itself so rigidly in Hume. In his book _L'Id<e9>e du Ph<e9>nom<e8>ne_ (1894),
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he had, however, recourse to the Leibnitzian doctrines, which had
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: finally exercised a considerable influence over Renouvier himself.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: III
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The reaction against positivism and against eclecticism took another
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: form quite apart from that of the neocritical philosophy. This was the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: triumphant spiritualist philosophy, as we may call it, to give it a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: general name, represented by a series of great thinkers--Ravaisson,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Lachelier, Fouill<e9>e, Guyau, Boutroux, Bergson and, we may add,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Blondel. These men have all of them had an influence much greater than
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that of Renouvier, and this is true of each of them separately. This
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is rather noteworthy for, if we exclude Fouillee, whose writings are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander
