text: rather too numerous, the works of all the other men together do not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: equal in quantity the work of Renouvier. There is another point which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is worthy of notice. While Renouvier worked in comparative solitude
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and never taught philosophy in any college or university, being, in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: fact, neglected by the University of Paris, all the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: company--Ravaisson, Lachelier, Fouill<e9>e, Guyau, Boutroux and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson--had a connection with the University of Paris in general,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: being associated with the Sorbonne, the Coll<e8>ge de France or the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: important Ecole Normale Sup<e9>rieure.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The initiator of the spiritualistic philosophy was Ravaisson
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1815-1900), who himself drew inspiration from Maine de Biran, to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: whose work he had called attention as early as 1840 in a vigorous
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: article contributed to the _Revue des Deux Mondes_. This roused the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: indignation of Victor Cousin and the eclectics, who in revenge
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: excluded Ravaisson from the Institute. His independent spirit had been
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: shown in his thesis _De l'Habitude_ (1838)_*_ and his remarkable
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: study of the metaphysics of Aristotle (1837-1846).
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_: Reproduced in 1894 in the _Revue de M<e9>taphysique et de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Morale_.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Ravaisson's chief title to fame, however, lies in his famous
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophic manifesto of 1867, for such, in fact, was his _Rapport sur
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: la Philosophie en France au XIX<e8> Si<e8>cle_. This Report, prepared for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the _Exposition universelle_ at the request of the Ministry of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Education, marks an epoch, for with it began the current of thought
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which was to dominate the close of the century. The "manifesto" was a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: call to free spirits to assert themselves in favour of a valid
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idealism. It, in itself, laid the foundations of such a philosophy and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dealt a blow to both the Eclectic School of Cousin and the followers
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Auguste Comte. Ravaisson wrote little, but his influence was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: powerful and made itself felt in the University, where in his office
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of president of the _agr<e9>gation en philosophie_ he exercised no little
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influence over the minds of younger men. His pupils, among whom are to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: be found Lachelier, Boutroux and Bergson, have testified to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: profound and inspiring influence which this thinker exercised. A
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: notable tribute to his memory is the address given by Bergson when he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was appointed to take Ravaisson's place at the _Acad<e9>mie des Sciences
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: morales et politiques_ in 1904.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Various influences meet in Ravaisson and determine his general
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attitude to thought. He reverts, as we have said, to Maine de Biran,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: whose insistence upon the inner life he approves. We must examine
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: human consciousness and make it our basis. We have in it powers of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: will, of desire and of love. Ravaisson blends the Aristotelian
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: insistence upon Thought with the Christian insistence upon Love. In
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his method he manifests the influence of the German philosopher,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Schelling, whose lectures he attended at Munich in company with the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: young Swiss thinker, Secretan._*_ This influence is seen in his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrine of synthesis and his intellectual intuition. Science
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: continues to give us analyses ever more detailed, but it cannot lead
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: us to the absolute. Our highest, most sublime knowledge is gained by a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: synthesis presented in and to our consciousness, an intuition.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Further, he argues that efficient causes, about which science has so
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: much to say, are really dependent upon final causes. Spiritual reality
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is anterior to material reality, and is characterised by goodness and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: beauty. Himself an artist, imbued with a passionate love of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: beautiful (he was guardian of sculptures at the Louvre), he constructs
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a philosophy in the manner of an artist. Like Guyau, he writes
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: metaphysics like poetry, and although he did not give us anything like
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Vers d'un Philosophe_, he would have endorsed the remarks which Guyau
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: made on the relation of poetry and philosophy if, indeed, it is not a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: fact that his influence inspired the younger man.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Charles Secretan (1815-1895), a Swiss thinker with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: whom Renouvier had interesting correspondence. His _Philosophie de la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Libert<e9>_ appeared in 1848-1849, followed by other works on religious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy. Pillon wrote a monograph upon him.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: After surveying the currents of thought up to 1867 Ravaisson not only
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: summed up in his concluding pages the elements of his own philosophy,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: but he ventured to assume the role of prophet. "Many signs permit us
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to foresee in the near future a philosophical epoch of which the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: general character will be the predominance of what may be called
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualistic realism or positivism, having as generating principle
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the consciousness which the mind has of itself as an existence
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: recognised as being the source and support of every other existence,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: being none other than its action."_*_ His prophecy has been
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: fulfilled in the work of Lachelier, Guyau, Fouill<e9>e, Boutroux,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson, Blondel and Weber.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : _Rapport_, 2nd ed., 1885, p. 275.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: After Ravaisson the spiritualist philosophy found expression in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work of Lachelier (1832-1918), a thinker whose importance and whose
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influence are both quite out of proportion to the small amount which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he has written._/-_ A brilliant thesis of only one hundred pages,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Du Fondement de l'Induction_, sustained in 1871, together with a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: little study on the Syllogism and a highly important article on
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Psychologie et M<e9>taphysique_, contributed to the _Revue philosophique_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in May of 1885, constitute practically all his written work._*_ It
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was orally that he made his influence felt; by his teaching at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Ecole Normale Sup<e9>rieure (1864-1875) he made a profound impression
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upon the youth of the University and the Ecole by the dignity and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: richness of his thought, as well as by its thoroughness.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : Dr. Merz, in his admirable _History of European
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Thought in the Nineteenth Century_, is wrong in regard to Lachelier's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dates; he confuses his resignation of professorship (1875) with his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: death. This, however, did not occur until as late as 1918. See the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: references in Mertz, vol. iii., p. 620, and vol. iv., p. 217.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : The thesis and the article have been published
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: together by Alcan, accompanied by notes on Pascal's Wager. The _Etude
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sur le Syllogisme_ also forms a volume in Alcan's _Biblioth<e8>que de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Philosophie contemporaine_.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Lachelier was a pupil of Ravaisson, and owes his initial inspiration
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to him. He had, however, a much more rigorous and precise attitude to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problems. This is apparent in the concentration of thought contained
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in his thesis. It is one of Lachelier's merits that he recognised the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: significance of Kant's work in a very profound manner. Until his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thesis appeared the influence of Leibnitz had been more noticeable in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French thought than that of Kant. It was noticeable in Ravaisson, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier, in spite of his professed adherence to Kant, passed to a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Leibnitzian position in his _Nouvelle Monadologie_.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The valuable work _Du Fondement de l'Induction_ is concerned mainly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with the problem of final causes, which Lachelier deduces from the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: necessity of totality judgments over and above those which concern
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: merely efficient causes. On the principle of final causes, or a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ideological conception of a rational unity and order, he founds
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Induction. It cannot be founded, he claims, upon a mere empiricism.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This is a point which will concern us later in our examination of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problem of science.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Lachelier was left, however, with the dualism of mechanism, operating
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: solely by efficient causes, and teleology manifested in final causes,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a dualism from which Kant did not manage to escape. In his article
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Psychologic et M<e9>taphysique_ he endeavoured to interpret mechanism
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: itself as a teleological activity of the spirit._*_ He indicates
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the absolute basis of our life and experience, indeed of the universe
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: itself, to be the absolute spontaneity of spirit. In spirit and in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: freedom we live and move and have our being. We do not affirm
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ourselves to be what we are, but rather we are what we affirm
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ourselves to be. We must not say that our present depends upon our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: past, for we really create all the moments of our life in one and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: same act, which is both present to each moment and above them
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: all._/-_ Here psychology appears as the science of thought itself
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and resolves itself into metaphysics. Here, too, we find the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: significance of the new spiritualism; we see its affinity with, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: its contrast to, the doctrines of the older spiritualism as professed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by Cousin. Lachelier here strikes the note which is so clearly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: characteristic of this current of thought, and is no less marked in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his work than in that of Bergson--namely, a belief in the supremacy of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spirit and in the reality of freedom.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : It is interesting to compare this with the attitude
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: taken by Lotze in Germany.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : _Psychologie et M<e9>taphysique_, p. 171.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The notion of freedom and of the spontaneity of the spirit became
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: watchwords of the new spiritualist philosophers. Under the work and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influence of Boutroux (1845-1921) these ideas were further emphasised
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and worked out more definitely to a position which assumes a critical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attitude to the dogmatism of modern science and establishes a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: contingency in all things. Boutroux's thesis _De la Contingence des
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Lois de la Nature_ appeared in 1874 and was dedicated to Ravaisson.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: His chief fame and his importance in the development of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualist philosophy rest upon this book alone. In 1894 he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: published a course of lectures given at the Sorbonne in 1892-3, _Sur
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: l'Id<e9>e de Loi naturelle_, which supplements the thesis. Outside his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: own country attention has been more readily bestowed upon his writings
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: on the history of philosophy, of which subject he was Professor. In
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his own country, however, great interest and value are attached to his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work on _The Contingency of the Laws of Nature_. In this Boutroux
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: combines the attitude of Ravaisson with that of Lachelier. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: totality of the laws of the universe manifests, according to him, a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: contingency. No explanation of these laws is possible apart from a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: free spiritual activity. The stress laid upon contingency in the laws
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of nature culminates in the belief in the freedom of man.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The critique of science which marked Boutroux's work has profoundly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influenced thinkers like Hannequin, Payot and Milhaud,_*_ and in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the following century appears in the work of Duhem and of Henri
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Poincar<e9>, the noted mathematician, whose books on _La Science et
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: l'Hypoth<e8>se_ (1902), _La Valeur de la Science_ (1905), and _Science et
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: M<e9>thode_ (1909) have confirmed many of Boutroux's conclusions._/-_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Hannequin's notable work is the _Essai critique sur
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: I'Hypoth<e8>se des Atomes_ (1896). Payot's chief book is _La Croyance_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1896). Milhaud's critique of science is contained in his _Essai sur
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: les Conditions et les Limites de la Certitude logique_ (1894), and in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Le Rationnel_ (1898). Duhem's book is _La Th<e9>orie physique_ (1906).]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_: It is interesting to note that Boutroux married
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Poincar<e9>'s sister, and that his son, Pierre Boutroux, whose education
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was guided by both his uncle and his father, is now Professor at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Coll<e8>ge de France. Emile Boutroux was a pupil of Zeller, whose
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: lectures on Greek philosophy he attended in Heidelberg, 1868. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: expressed to the writer his grief at the later prostitution of German
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought to nationalist and materialist aims. He was Professor of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: History of Philosophy in Paris from 1888, then Honorary Professor of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Modern Philosophy. In 1914 he gave the Hertz Lecture to the British
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Academy on _Certitude et V<e9>rit<e9>_. He was until his death Directeur de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: la Fondation Thiers, a college for post-graduate study, literary,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophical and scientific.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: While the new spiritualist current was thus tending to a position far
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: removed from that of Taine, at the commencement of our period, a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: wavering note was struck by the idealist Fouill<e9>e (1838-1912), who,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: while maintaining a general attitude in harmony with the new doctrines
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: endeavoured to effect a reconciliation with the more positive attitude
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to science and philosophy. In his _philosophie des ide<e9>s-forces__*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he endeavoured to combine and reconcile the diverging attitudes of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Plato and of Comte. He shows a scorn of the neo-critical though of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier. He wrote in his shorter life more books than did Renouvier,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and he is conspicuous among this later group of thinkers for his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mass-production of books, which appeared steadily at the rate of one
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _per annum_ to the extent of some thirty-seven volumes, after he gave
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: up his position as _ma<ee>tre de conf<e9>rence_ at the Ecole Normale owing
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to ill-health._/-_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : His _Evolutionnisme des Id<e9>es-forces_ appeared in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1890, _La Psychologie des Id<e9>es-forces_ three years later. His _Morale
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: des Id<e9>es-forces_ belongs to the next century (1907), but its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: principles were contained already in his thesis _Libert<e9> et
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: D<e9>terminisme_.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : He only held this for three years, 1872-75.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fouill<e9>e, with the noblest intentions, set himself to the solution of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that problem which we have already indicated as being the central one
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of our period, the relation of science and ethics, or, in brief, the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problem of freedom. This was the subject of his thesis, undoubtedly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the best book he ever wrote, _La Libert<e9> et le D<e9>terminisme_, which he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sustained in 1872._/=_ The attitude which he takes in that work is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the keynote to his entire philosophy. Well grounded in a knowledge of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the history of systems of philosophy, ancient and modern, he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: recognises elements of truth in each, accompanied by errors due mainly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to a one-sided perspective._<U+00A7>_ He recalls a statement of Leibnitz
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the effect that most systems are right in their assertions and err
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in their denials. Fouill<e9>e was convinced that there was reconciliation
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: at the heart of things, and that the contradictions we see are due to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: our point of view. Facing, therefore, in this spirit, the problems of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the hour, he set himself "to reconcile the findings of science with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the reality of spirit, to establish harmony between the determinism
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upheld by science and the liberty which the human spirit acclaims,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: between the mechanism of nature and the aspirations of man's heart,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: between the True which is the object of all science and the Good which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is the goal of morality."_*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/=_ : This work created quite a stir in the intellectual
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and political world in France just after the war. Fouill<e9>e's book led
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to an attack on the ministry, which did not go so far as that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: occasioned by Renouvier's volume in 1849. (See p. 61.)]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _<U+00A7>_ : Fouill<e9>e stands in marked contrast to Comte in his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: general acquaintance with the history of ideas. Comte, like Spencer,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: knew little of any philosophy but his own. Fouill<e9>e, however, was well
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: schooled, not only in Plato and the ancients, but had intimate
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: knowledge of the work of Kant, Comte, Spencer, Lotze, Renouvier,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Lachelier, Boutroux and Bergson.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : This is also the idea expressed at length in his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Avenir de la M<e9>taphysique_, 1889.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fouill<e9>e had no desire to offer merely another eclecticism _<e0> la mode
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: de Cousin_; he selects, therefore, his own principle of procedure.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This principle is found in his notion of _id<e9>e-force_. Following
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ancient usage, he employs the term "idea" for _any_ mental
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: presentation. For Fouill<e9>e, however, ideas are not _id<e9>es-spectacles_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: merely exercising a platonic influence "remote as the stars shining
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: above us." They are not merely mental reproductions of an object, real
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: or hypothetical, outside the mind. Ideas are in themselves forces
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which endeavour to work out their own realisation. Fouill<e9>e opposes
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his doctrine to the evolutionary theory of Spencer and Huxley. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: disagrees with their mechanism and epiphenomenalism, pointing out
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: legitimately that our ideas, far from being results of purely physical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and independent causes, are themselves factors, and very vital
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: factors, in the process of evolution. Fouill<e9>e looks upon the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mechanistic arrangement of the world as an expression or symbol of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idea or spirit in a manner not unlike that of Lotze.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: He bears out his view of _id<e9>es-forces_ by showing how a state of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: consciousness tries to realise its object. The idea of movement is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: closely bound up with the physiological and physical action, and,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: moreover, tends to produce it. This realisation is not a merely
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mechanistic process but is teleological and depends on the vital unity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: between the physical and the mental. On this fundamental notion
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fouill<e9>e constructs his psychology, his ethic, his sociology and his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: metaphysic. He sees in the evolutionary process ideas at work which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tend to realise themselves. One of these is the idea of freedom, in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which idea he endeavours to find a true reconciliation of the problem
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of determinism in science and the demands of the human spirit which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: declares itself free. The love of freedom arising from the idea of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: freedom creates in the long run this freedom. This is Fouill<e9>e's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: method all through. "To conceive and to desire the ideal is already to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: begin its realisation." He applies his method with much success in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: realm of ethics and sociology where he opposes to the Marxian doctrine
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of a materialist determination of history that of a spiritual and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intellectual determination by ideas. Fouill<e9>e's philosophy is at once
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intellectual and voluntarist. He has himself described it as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "spiritualistic voluntarism." It is a system of idealism which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reflects almost all the elements of modern thought. In places his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrine of reconciliation appears to break down, and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychological law summed up in _id<e9>es-forces_ is hardly sufficient to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: bear the vast erection which Fouill<e9>e builds upon it. The idea is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: nevertheless a valuable and fruitful one. Fouill<e9>e's respect for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positive science is noteworthy, as is also his great interest in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: social problems._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : At the end of the century these problems received
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: highly specialised attention in the work of the sociologists inspired
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by Comte's influence. Works of special merit in this direction are:
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tspmas, with his _Soci<e9>t<e9>'s animales_ (1876) and Tarde, predecessor of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson at the Coll<e8>ge de France (1843-1907), with his _Criminalit<e9>
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: compar<e9>e_ (1898) and _Les Lois de l'Imitation_ (1900), also Durkheim's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work _De la Division du Travail social_ (1893) and _Les R<e9>gles de la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: M<e9>thode sociologique_ (1894), and Izoulet, with his _La Cit<e9> moderne_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1894). Note those of Levy-Bruhl, Bougl<e9>, and Le Bon.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The importance of the sociological aspect of all problems was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: emphasised in a brilliant manner by Guyau (1854-1888), the step-son of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fouill<e9>e. Guyau was a gifted young man, whose death at the early age
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of thirty-four was a sore bereavement for Fouill<e9>e and undoubtedly a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: disaster for philosophy. Guyau was trained by his step-father,_*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and assisted him in his work. When ill-health forced both men from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: their professorships,_/-_ they lived in happy comradeship at
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Mentone at the same time, it is interesting to note, that Nietzsche
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was residing there. Equally interesting is it to observe that although
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Guyau and Fouill<e9>e were unaware of the German thinker's presence or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his work, Nietzsche was well acquainted with theirs, particularly that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Guyau. Doubtless he would have been pleased to meet the author of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the _Esquisse d'une Morale sans Obligation ni Sanction_ (1885) and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _L'Irreligion de l'Avenir_ (1887). Editions of these books exist in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the _Nietzsche-Archiv_ bearing Nietzsche's notes and comments.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Some authorities are of opinion that Fouill<e9>e was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: actually the father of Guyau. Fouill<e9>e married Guyau's mother.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : Guyau taught at the Lyc<e9>e Condorcet (1874) where
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: young Henri Bergson was studying (1868-1878).]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Guyau himself has a certain affinity with Nietzsche, arising from his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: insistence upon Life and its power; but the author of the delightful
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: little collection _Vers d'un Philosophe_ (1881) is free from the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: egoism expressed in _Der Wille zur Macht_. Guyau posits as his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _id<e9>e-directrice_ the conception of Life, both individual and social,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and in this concept he professes to find a basis more fundamental than
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that of force, movement or existence. Life involves expansion and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intension, fecundity and creation. It means also consciousness,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intelligence and feeling, generosity and sociability. "He only lives
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: well who lives for others." Life can only exist by extending. It can
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: never be purely egoistic and endure; a certain giving of itself, in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: generosity and in love, is necessary for its continuance. Such is the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: view which the French philosopher-poet expresses in opposition to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Nietzsche, starting, however, from the concept of Life did Nietzsche.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Guyau worked out a doctrine of ethics and of religion based upon this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: concept which will demand our special attention in its proper place,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: when we consider the moral and religious problem. He strove to give an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idealistic setting to the doctrines of evolution, and this alone would
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: give him a place among the great thinkers of the period.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In his doctrine of the relation of thought and action Guyau followed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the _philosophie des id<e9>es-forces_. On the other hand there are very
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: remarkable affinities between the thought of Guyau and that of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson. Guyau is not so severely intellectual as Fouill<e9>e; his manner
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of thought and excellence of style are not unlike Bergson. More
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: noticeably he has a conception of life not far removed from the _<e9>lan
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: vital_. His "expansion of life" has, like Bergson's _<e9>volution
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cr<e9>atrice_, no goal other than that of its own activity. After Guyau's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: death in 1888 it was found that he had been exercised in mind about
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the problem of Time, for he left the manuscript of a book entitled _La
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Gen<e8>se de l'Id<e9>e de Temps_._*_ He therein set forth a belief in a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychological, heterogeneous time other than mathematical time, which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is really spatial in character. In this psychological time the spirit
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: lives. The year following Guyau's death, but before his posthumous
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: work appeared, Bergson published his thesis _Les Donn<e9>es imm<e9>diates de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: la Conscience_ (1889), which is better described by its English title
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Time and Free Will_, and in which this problem which had been present
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to Guyau's mind is taken up and treated in an original and striking
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: manner. In Guyau, too, is seen the rise of the conception of activity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: so marked in the work of Bergson and of Blondel. "It is _action_ and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the power of life," he insists, "which alone can solve, if not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: entirely at least partially, those problems to which abstract thought
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: gives rise."_/-_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : This work was edited and published by Fouill<e9>e two
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: years after Guyau's death, and reviewed by Bergson in the _Revue
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophique_ in 1891]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_: _Esquisse d'une Morale sans Obligation ni Sanction_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson, born in 1859, Professor at the Coll<e8>ge de France from 1901 to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1921, now retired, has had a popularity to which none of the other
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thinkers of this group, or indeed of our period, has attained. He is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the only one of the new idealists or spiritualists who is well known
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: outside his own country. For this reason foreigners are apt to regard
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: him as a thinker unrelated to any special current of thought, an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: innovator. Although much is original and novel in his philosophy, his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought marks the stage in the development to which the spiritualist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: current has attained in contemporary thought. The movement of which he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: forms a part we can trace back as far as Maine de Biran, to whom
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson owes much, as he does also to Ravaisson, Lachelier, Boutroux
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Guyau.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Two important books by Bergson came prior to 1900, his _Time and Free
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Will_ (1889) and his _Matter and Memory_ (1896). His famous _Creative
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Evolution_ appeared in 1907. It is but his first work "writ large,"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for we have in _Time and Free Will_ the essentials of his philosophy.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: He makes, as did Guyau, a central point of Change, a universal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: becoming, and attacks the ordinary notion of time, which he regards as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: false because it is spatial. We ourselves live and act in _dur<e9>e_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which is Bergson's term for real time as opposed to that fictitious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: time of the mathematician or astronomer. He thus lays stress upon the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: inward life of the spirit, with its richness and novelty, its eternal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: becoming, its self-creation. He has his own peculiar manner of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: approaching our central problem, that of freedom, of which he realises
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the importance. For him the problem resolves itself into an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: application of his doctrine of _la dur<e9>e_, to which we shall turn in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: due course.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson insists with Guyau and Blondel upon the primary significance
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of action. The importance attached to action colours his whole theory
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of knowledge. His epistemology rests upon the thesis that "the brain
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is an instrument of action and not of representation," and that "in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the study of the problems of perception the starting- point should be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: action and not sensation." This is a psychology far different from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that of Condillac and Taine, and it is largely upon his merit as a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychologist that Bergson's fame rests. He devoted his second work,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Matter and Memory_, to showing that memory is something other than a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: function of the brain. His distinction between "pure" memory and mere
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: memorising power, which is habit, recalls the _m<e9>moire_ of Maine de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Biran and of Ravaisson upon _Habit_. Bergson sees in memory a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: manifestation of spirit, which is a fundamental reality, no mere
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: epiphenomenon. Spirit is ever striving against matter, but in spite of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this dualism which he cannot escape, he maintains that spirit is at
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the origin of things. This is a difficulty which is more clearly seen
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in his later book, _Creative Evolution_. Matter is our enemy and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: threatens our personality in its spiritual reality by a tendency to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: lead us into habit, away from life, freedom and creativeness.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Further we must, he claims, endeavour to see things _sub specie
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: durationis in a dur<e9>e_, in an eternal becoming. We cannot expect to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: grasp all the varied reality of life in a formula or indeed in any
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: purely intellectual manner. This is the chief defect of science and of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the so-called scientific point of view. It tries to fix in concepts,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: moulds and solid forms a reality which is living and moving eternally.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: For Bergson all is Change, and this eternal becoming we can only grasp
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by intuition. Intuition and intellect do not, however, oppose one
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: another. We are thus led to realise that Life is more than logic. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergsonian philosophy concludes with intuitionism and contingency,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which drew upon it the severe criticisms of Fouill<e9>e,_*_ who
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: termed it a philosophy of scepticism and nihilism. Of all the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualist group Fouill<e9>e stands nearest the positive attitude to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: science, and his strong intellectualism comes out in his criticism of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson, who well represents, together with Blondel, the tendency
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: towards non-intellectual attitudes inherent in the spiritualist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: development. Blondel has endeavoured to treat the great problems, a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: task which Bergson has not attempted as yet, partly because he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (Bergson) shares Renan's belief that "the day of philosophic systems
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: has gone," partly because he desires to lay the basis of a philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the spirit to which others after him may contribute, and so he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: devotes his attention to method and to those crucial points, such as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the problem of freedom upon which a larger doctrine must necessarily
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rest._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Particularly in his work _Le Mouvement id<e9>aliste et la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: R<e9>action contre la Science positive_ (cf. .206), 1896, and later in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _La Pens<e9>e et les nouvelles Ecoles anti-intellectualistes_, 1910.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
