text: [Footnote _*_ : For a fuller appreciation of the Bergsonian doctrines
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: than is possible in such a survey as this, the reader is referred to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the author's monograph, _Bergson and His Philosophy_, Methuen and Co.,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The current of the new idealism or spiritualism reaches a culminating
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: point in the work of Blondel (born about 1870), whose remarkable and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: noteworthy book _L'Action_ appeared in l893._/-_ The fundamental
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thesis of the Philosophy of Action_/=_ is that man's life is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: primarily one of action, consequently philosophy must concern itself
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with the active life and not merely with thought. By its nature,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: action is something unique and irreducible to other elements or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: factors. It is not the result of any synthesis: it is itself a living
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: synthesis, and cannot be dealt with as the scientist deals with his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: data. Blondel lays emphasis, as did Bergson, upon "the living" being
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unique and inexpressible in formulae. Intellect cannot grasp action;
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "one penetrates the living reality only by placing oneself at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dynamic point of view of the will."_*_ His words recall Bergson's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attitude to the free act. "The principle of action eludes positive
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: knowledge at the moment at which it makes it possible, and, in a word
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that needs to be better defined, it is subjectivity."_/-_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: France, growing since 1870, and keener in the eighties, led to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: foundation of the famous _Revue de M<e9>taphysique et de Morale_ by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Xavier L<e9>on. In 1876 (the same year in which Professor Croom Robertson
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: in England established the periodical _Mind_) Ribot had founded the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Revue philosophique de la France et de l'Etranger_. These journals,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: along with the teaching in the Lyc<e9>es, have contributed to make the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French people the best educated, philosophically, of any people.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/=_ : It is interesting to note that this designation has
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: the theory of Peirce and James, and with their use of the term in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: another manner, with which he did not agree. See _Bulletin de la

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Blondel, however, leads us beyond this subjectivity, for it is not the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: will which causes what is. Far from that, he maintains that in so far
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as it wills it implies something which it does not and cannot create
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of itself; it wills to be what it is not yet. We do not act for the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mere sake of acting, but for some end, something beyond the particular
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: act. Action is not self-contained or self- sufficing: it is a striving
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to further attainment or achievement. It therefore pre-supposes some
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reality beyond itself. Here appear the elements of "passion" and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "suffering" due to resistance, for all action involves some
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: opposition. In particular moral action implies this resistance and a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: consciousness of power to overcome the resistance, and it therefore
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: involves a reality which transcends the sphere in which we act.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Owing to this inequality between the power and the wish, we are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: obliged to complete our actions or our activity in general by a belief
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in a Reality beyond. It is, however, "a beyond that is within," a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Divine power immanent in man. This view, Blondel claims, unites the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idea of God "transcendent" with the idea of God as "immanent." Man's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: action partakes of both, for in so far as it results from his own will
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it is immanent; transcendence is, however, implied in the fact that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the end of man's action as a whole is not "given." Blondel leads us to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a conception of a religious idealism in which every act of our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ordinary existence leads ultimately to a religious faith. Every action
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is sacramental. Blondel and his follower Laberthonni<e8>re, who has taken
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: up this idea from his master in his volume of _Essais de Philosophie
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: r<e9>ligieuse_ (1901), go beyond a purely pragmatist or voluntarist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: position by finding the supreme value of all action, and of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: universe, not in will but in love. For Blondel this word is no mere
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sentiment or transient feeling, but a concrete reality which is the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: perfection of will and of intellect alike, of action and of knowledge.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The "Philosophy of Action," asserts Blondel, includes the "Philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the Idea." In the fact of love, he claims, is found the perfect
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unity between the self and the non-self, the ground of personality and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: its relation to the totality of persons, producing a unity in which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: each is seen as an end to others as well as to himself. "Love," says
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Laberthonni<e8>re, "is the first and last word of all. It is the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: principle, the means and the end. It is in loving that one gets away
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: from self and raises oneself above one's temporal individuality. It is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in loving that one finds God and other beings, and that one finds
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: oneself." It is, in short, these idealists claim, the _Summum Bonum_;
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in it is found the Absolute which philosophers and religious mystics
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of all ages have ever sought.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The "philosophy of action" is intimately bound up with the "philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of belief," formulated by Oll<e9>-Laprune, and the movement in religious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought known generally as Modernism, which is itself due to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influence of modern philosophic thought upon the dogmas of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Christian religion, as these are stated by the Roman Church. Both the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Philosophy of Belief and Modernism are characterised by an intense
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spirituality and a moral earnestness which maintain the primacy of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: practical reason over the theoretical reason. Life, insists
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Oll<e9>-Laprune in his book _Le Prix de la Vie_ (l885),_*_ is not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: contemplation but active creation. He urges us to a creative evolution
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the good, to an employment of _id<e9>es-forces_. "There are things to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: be made whose measure is not determined; there are things to be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: discovered, to be invented, new forms of the good, ideas which have
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: never yet been received--creations, as it were, of the spirit that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: loves the good." This dynamism and power of will is essential. We must
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: not lose ourselves in abstractions; action is the supreme thing: it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: alone constitutes reality.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : This has been followed in the new century by _La
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Raison et le Rationalisme_, 1906. As early as 1880, however, he issued
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his work _La Certitude morale_, which influenced Blondel, his pupil.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: A similar note is sounded by the Modernists or Neo-Catholics,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: particularly by the brilliant disciple and successor of Bergson, Le
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Roy, who in _Dogme et Critique_ (1907) has based the reality of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religious dogma upon its practical significance. We find P<e9>guy (who
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: fell on the field of battle in 1914) applying Bergsonian ideas to a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: fervid religious faith. Wilbois unites these ideas to social ethics in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his _Devoir et Dur<e9>e_ (1912). In quite different quarters the new
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualism and philosophy of action have appeared as inspiring the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Syndicalism of Sorel, who endeavours to apply the doctrines of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bergson, Oll<e9>-Laprune and Blondel to the solution of social questions
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in his _R<e9>flexions sur la Violence_ (1907) and _Illusions du Progr<e8>s_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It would be erroneous to regard Bergson's intuitional philosophy as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: typical of all contemporary French thought. Following Renouvier,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fouill<e9>e and Boutroux, there prevail currents of a more
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intellectualist or rationalist type, to which we are, perhaps, too
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: close to see in true and historical perspective. The _<e9>lan vital_ of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French thought continues to manifest itself in a manner which combines
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the work of Boutroux and Bergson with Blondel's idealism. A keen
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: interest is being taken in the works of Spinoza, Kant and Hegel, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this is obviously influencing the trend of French philosophy at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: moment, without giving rise to a mere eclecticism. French thought is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: too original and too energetic for that. In addition to these
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: classical studies we should note the great and growing influence of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the work of Durkheim and of Hamelin, both of whom we have already
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mentioned. The former gave an immense impetus to sociological studies
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by his earlier work. Further interest arose with his _Formes
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: <e9>l<e9>mentaires de la Vie religieuse_ in 1912. Hamelin indicated a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: turning-point from _neo-criticisme_ through the new spiritualist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrines to Hegelian methods and ideas. Brunschwicg, who produced a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: careful study of Spinoza, wrote as early as 1897 on _La Modalit<e9> du
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Jugement_, a truly Kantian topic. This thinker's later works, _Les
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Etapes de la Philosophie mathematique_ (1912) and the little volume
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _La Vie de l'esprit_, illustrate a tendency to carry out the line
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: taken by Boutroux--namely, to arrive at the statement of a valid
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idealism disciplined by positivism. The papers of Berthelot in his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Evolutionnisme et Platonisme_ are a further contribution to this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: great end. In the work of Evellin, _La Raison pure et les Antinomies_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1907), the interest in Kant and Hegel is again seen. No<eb>l, who
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: contributed an excellent monograph on Lachelier to the _Revue de
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: M<e9>taphysique et de Morale_ (that journal which is an excellent witness
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in itself to the vitality of contemporary French philosophy), produced
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a careful study of Hegel's Logik in 1897. Since that date interest has
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: grown along the lines of Boutroux, Bergson and Blondel in an attempt
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to reach a positive idealism, which would combine the strictly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positivist attitude so dear to French minds with the tendency to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualism or idealism which they also manifest. This attempt, which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in some respects amounts to an effort to restate the principles of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Hegel in modern or contemporary terms, was undertaken by Weber in 1903
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in his book entitled _Vers le Positivisme absolu par l'Id<e9>alisme_.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Philosophy in France realises to-day that the true course of spiritual
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: development will be at once positive and idealistic.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: CHAPTER III
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: SCIENCE
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: HAVING thus surveyed the main currents of our period and indicated the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: general attitude adopted to knowledge by the various thinkers, we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: approach more closely to the problem of the relation of science and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy. The nineteenth century was a period in which this problem
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was keenly felt, and France was the country in which it was tensely
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: discussed by the most acute minds among the philosophers and among the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: scientists. French thought and culture, true to the tradition of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: great geometrician and metaphysician Descartes, have produced men
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: whose training has been highly scientific as well as philosophical.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Her philosophers have been keenly versed in mathematics and physical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: science, while her scientists have had considerable power as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophical thinkers.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: One of the very prominent tendencies of thought in the first half of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the nineteenth century was the growing belief and confidence in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: natural sciences. In France this was in large measure due to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: progress of those sciences themselves and to the influences of Comte,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which was supported by the foreign influences of Kant's teaching and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that of the English School, particularly John Stuart Mill. These three
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: great streams of thought, widely different in many respects, had this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in common--that they tended to confuse philosophy and science to such
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a degree that it seemed doubtful whether the former could be granted
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: any existence by itself. Science, somewhat intoxicated by the praise
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and worship bestowed upon her, became proud, arrogant and overbearing.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: She scorned facts which could not be adapted to her own nature, she
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ignored data which were not quantitative and materialistic, and she
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: regarded truth as a system of laws capable of expression by strict
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mathematical methods and formulae*. Hence science became characterised
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by a firm belief in absolute determinism, in laws of necessity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: operating after the manner of mathematical laws. This "universal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mathematic" endeavoured also to explain the complex by reference to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the simple. Difficulties were encountered all along the line, for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: experience, it was found, did not quite fit into rigid formulae*,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "new" elements of experience presented a unique character and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: distressing discrepancy. Confidence in science, however, was not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: shaken by this, for the perfect science, it was imagined, was assured
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in a short time. Patience might be needed, but no doubt was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: entertained of the _possibility_ of such a construction. Doubters were
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: told to look at the rising sciences of psychology and sociology,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which, as Auguste Comte had himself prophesied, were approaching
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: gradually to the "type" venerated--namely, an exact and mathematical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: character. Biology, it was urged, was merely a special branch of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: physico-chemistry. As for beliefs in freedom, in art, morality and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religion, these, like philosophy (metaphysics) itself, belonged to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: earlier stages (the theological and metaphysical) of Comte's list,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: stages rapidly to be replaced by the third and final "positive" era.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Such, briefly stated, were the affirmations so confidently put forward
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: on behalf of science by its devoted worshippers. Confidence in science
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was a marked feature of the work written by Renan in the years
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1848-1849, _L'Avenir de la Science_. Yet, paradoxical as it may seem,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renan himself played a large part in undermining this confidence. Yet
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the time of his writing this work is undoubtedly the period when the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: confidence in science was most marked. By this it is not implied that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: an even greater confidence in science has not been professed since by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: many thinkers. That is probably true, but the important point is that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: at this time the confidence in science was less resisted than ever in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: its history. It seemed to have a clear field and positivism seemed to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: be getting unto itself a mighty victory.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The cult of facts, which is so marked a characteristic of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: scientific or positivist temper, penetrated, it is interesting to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: note, into the realm of literature, where it assumed the form of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "realism." In his Intelligence we find Taine remarking, "_de tout
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: petits fails bien choisis, importants, significatifs, amplement
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: circonstanci<e9>s et minutieusement not<e9>s, voil<e0> aujourd'hui la mati<e8>re
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: de toute science_."_*_ It was also, in the opinion of several
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: writers, the _mati<e8>re de toute litt<e9>rature_. The passion for minute
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: details shows itself in the realism of Flaubert and Zola, in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychology of Stendthal* and the novels of the Goncourts. It was no
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: accident that their works were so loved by Taine. A similar spirit of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "positivism" or "realism" animated both them and him.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Preface to _Intelligence_.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: With the turn of the half century, however, a change manifested itself
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by the fact that the positivist current began to turn against itself,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and our period is, in some respects, what Fouill<e9>e has called _la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: r<e9>action centre la science positive_._/-_ The function of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy is essentially criticism, and although at that period the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: vitality of philosophy was low, it nevertheless found enough energy to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: criticise the demands and credentials of Science.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : Compare also Aliotta's book, _The Idealistic Reaction
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: against Science_, Eng. trans., 19l4.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The publication of Claude Bernard's volume _Introduction <e0> la M<e9>decine
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: experimentale__/=_ drew from the pen of Paul Janet, the last of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: Eclectic School dominated by Cousin, an article of criticism which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: appeared in the _Revue des Deux Mondes_, and was later published in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his volume of essays entitled, _Les Probl<e8>mes du XIXe Si<e8>cle_.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Although Janet's essay reveals all the deficiencies of the older
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualism, he makes a gallant attempt to combat the dogmatism and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the assumed finality of Bernard's point of view and that of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: scientists in general. Janet regarded the sciences and their relation
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to philosophy as constituting an important problem for the century and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in this judgment he was not mistaken.

author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: General"; chap, ii., on The Experimental Method in Physiology," pp.

text: I
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We have, in our Introductory Chapter, reckoned Auguste Comte among the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influential antecedents of our period. Here, in approaching the study
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the problem of science, we may note that the tendency towards the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: strictly scientific attitude, and to the promotion of the scientific
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _spirit_ in general, was partly due to the influence of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positivism. Comte's intended Religion of Humanity failed, his system
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of positive philosophy has been neglected, but the SPIRIT which he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: inculcated has abided and has borne fruit. We would be wrong, however,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: if we attributed much to Comte as the originator of that spirit. His
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positive philosophy, although it greatly stimulated and strengthened
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the positive attitude adopted by the natural sciences, was itself in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: large measure inspired by and based upon these sciences. Consequently
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: much of Comte's glory was a reflected light, his thought was a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: challenge to the old spiritualism, an assertion of the rights of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sciences to proclaim their existence and to demand serious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: consideration.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Although he succeeded in calling the attention of philosophy to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: natural sciences, yet owing to the mere fact that he based himself on
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the sciences of his day much of his thought has become obsolete by the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: progress and extension of those very sciences themselves. He tended,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with a curious dogmatism, to assign limits to the sciences by keeping
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: them in separate compartments and in general by desiring knowledge to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: be limited to human needs. Although there is important truth in his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrine of discontinuity or irreducible differences, the subsequent
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: development of the natural sciences has cleared away many barriers
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which he imagined to be impassable. There still are, and may always
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: be, gaps in our knowledge of the progress from inorganic to organic,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: from the living creature to self-conscious personality, but we have a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: greater conception of the unity of Nature than had Comte. Many new
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ideas and discoveries have transformed science since his day,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: particularly the doctrines dealing with heat as a form of motion, with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: light, electricity, and the radio-activity of matter, the structure of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the atom, and the inter-relation of physics and chemistry.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte's claim for different methods in the different departments of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: science is of considerable interest, in view of present-day biological
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problems and the controversies of vitalists, mechanists and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: neo-vitalists._*_ Although Comte insisted upon discontinuity, yet
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he urged the necessity for an _esprit d'ensemble_, the consideration
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of things synthetically, in their "togetherness." He feared that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: analysis, the _esprit de d<e9>tail_ or mathematisation, was being carried
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: out _<e0> l'outrance_. This opinion he first stated in 1825 in his tract
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: entitled _Consid<e9>rations sur les Sciences et les Savants_. On the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: social side he brought this point out further by insisting on the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _esprit d'ensemble_ as involving the social standpoint in opposition
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to a purely individualistic view of human life.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : See, for example, _The Mechanism of Life_, by Dr.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Johnstone, Professor of Oceanography in the University of Liverpool.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (Arnold, 1921.)]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte was slow to realise the importance of Ethics as an independent
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: study. Psychology he never recognised as a separate discipline,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: deeming it part of physiology. He gave a curious appreciation to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: phrenology. Unfortunately he overlooked the important work done by the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: introspectionist psychologists in England and the important work of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Maine de Biran in his own country. One is struck by Comte's inability
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to appreciate the immense place occupied by psychology in modern life
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and in particular its expression in the modern novel and in much
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: modern poetry. An acquaintance with the works of men like De Regnier,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Pierre Loti and Anatole France is sufficient to show how large a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: factor the psychological method is in French literature and life. It
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is to be put down to Comte's eternal discredit that he failed to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: appreciate psychology. Here lies the greatest defect in his work, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it is in this connection that his work is now being supplemented.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Positivism in France to-day is not a synonym for "Comtism" at all; the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: term is now employed to denote the spirit and temper displayed in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: methods of the exact sciences. For Comte, we must never forget,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: scientific investigation was a means and not an end in itself. His
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: main purpose was social and political regeneration. Positivism since
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte differs from his philosophy by a keen attention bestowed upon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychology, and many of Comte's inadequate conceptions have been
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: enriched by the introduction of a due recognition of psychological
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: factors.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It is to be noted that Comte died two years before Darwin's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _chef-d'uvre_ appeared, and that he opposed the doctrine of evolution
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as put forward by Lamarck. Although Comte's principle of discontinuity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: may in general have truth in it, the problem is a far more complicated
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: one than he imagined it to be. Again, while Comte's opposition to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: subjectivism of Cousin was a wholesome influence, he did not accord to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychology its full rights, and this alone has been gravely against
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the acceptance of his philosophy, and explains partly the rise and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: progress of the new spiritualist doctrines. His work served a useful
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: purpose, but Comte never closed definitely with the problem of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: precise significance of "positivism" or with its relation to a general
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: conception of the universe; in short, he confined himself to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: increasing the scientific spirit in thought, leaving aside the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: difficulty of relating science and philosophy.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte stated in his _Philosophie positive__*_ that he regarded
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attempts to explain all phenomena by reference to one law as futile,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: even when undertaken by the most competent minds well versed in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: study of the sciences. Although he believed in discontinuity he tried
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to bridge some gaps, notably by his endeavour to refer certain
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: physiological phenomena to the law of gravitation.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Vol. i., pp. 53-56.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The chief work which this undoubtedly great mind accomplished was the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: organisation of the scientific spirit as it appeared in his time.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renan hardly does justice to him in his sarcastic remark in his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Souvenirs d'Enfance et de Jeunesse_. "I felt quite irritated at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idea of Auguste Comte being dignified with the title of a great man
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for having expressed in bad French what all scientific minds had seen
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for the last two hundred years as clearly as he had done." His work
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: merits more than dismissal in such a tone, and we may here note, as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the essence of the spirit which he tried to express, his definition of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the positive or scientific attitude to the universe given at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: commencement of his celebrated Cours de _Philosophie positive_. There,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in defining the positive stage, Comte speaks of it as that period in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which "the human spirit, recognising the impossibility of obtaining
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: absolute conceptions, abandons the search for the origin and the goal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the universe and the inner causes of things, to set itself the task
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: merely of discovering, by reasoning and by experience combined, the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: effective laws of phenomena--that is to say, their invariable
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: relations of succession and of similarity."_*_ This positive spirit
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte strove to express rather than to originate, for it was already
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: there in the sciences. Undoubtedly his work made it more prominent,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: more clear, and so we have to note an interaction between positivism
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in the sciences and in philosophy.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Le<e7>on i.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It is equally important for our purpose to notice that the period was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: one rich in scientific thought. The work of Lavoisier and Bichat, both
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of whom as contemporaries of Maine de Biran, belong to the former
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: century, was now bearing fruit. Lavoisier's influence had been great
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: over chemistry, which he established on a modern basis, by formulating
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the important theory of the conservation of mass and by clearing away
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: false and fan- tastic conceptions regarding combustion._*_ Bichat,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the great anatomist and physiologist, died in 1802, but the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: publication of his works in a completed form was not accomplished
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: until 1854. The work and influence of the _Acad<e9>mie des Sciences_ are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: noteworthy features of French culture at this time. There stands out
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: prominently the highly important work of Cuvier in anatomy, zoology
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and pal<e6>ontology._/-_ The nineteenth century was a period of great
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: scientists and of great scientific theories. Leverrier, applying
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: himself to the problem of the motions of Uranus, found a solution in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the hypothesis of another planet, Neptune, which was actually
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: discovered from his calculations in 1846. This was a notable victory
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for logical and scientific method. In 1809 Lamarck had outlined, prior
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to Spencer or Darwin, the scheme of the evolutionary theory
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (Transformism)._/=_ Spencer's work, which appeared from 1850
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: onwards, has always commanded respect and attention in France even
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: among its critics._<U+00A7>_ Interest increased upon the publication of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Darwin's _Origin of Species_ in 1859, and its translation into French
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in 1862. These dates coincide with the rise of the _Soci<e9>t<e9>
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: d'Anthropologie_ de Paris, founded by Broca in the same year that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Darwin's book appeared. Another translation from Darwin's work
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: followed in 1872, _Descendance de l'Homme_, which aroused further
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: interest in the evolutionary theory. At the same time the work of men
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: such as Pasteur, Bertrand, Berthelot and Bernard gave an impetus and a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: power to science. Poincare belongs rather to the twentieth century.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Pasteur (1822-1895) showed mankind how science could cure its ills by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: patient labour and careful investigation, and earned the world's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: gratitude for his noble work. His various _Discours_ and his volume,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Le Budget de la Science_ (1868), show his faith in this progressive
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: power of science. In Bertrand (1822-1900), his contemporary who held
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the position of Professor of Mathematics at the College de France, a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: similar attitude appears.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Lavoisier perished at the guillotine in 1794, and his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: death was a tragic loss to science.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : Cuvier's _Anatomie compar<e9>e_ appeared in the years
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1800-1805, following his _Histoire naturelle_ (1798-1799). Later came
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his _Rapport sur les Sciences naturelles_ (1810) and his work _Le
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Regne animal_ (1816).He died in 1832. We may note that Cuvier opposed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the speculative evolutionary doctrines of Lamarck, with whom he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: indulged in controversy.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/=_ : In his work, _Philosophie zoologique, ou Exposition
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: des Consid<e9>rations relatives a l'Histoire naturelle des Animaux_, 2
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: vols Paris, Dentu, 1809.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _<U+00A7>_ : His _Social Statics_ was published in 1850, and his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Psychology_ five years later. His life work, _The Synthetic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: Philosophy_, extends over the period 1860-1896.]

text: One of the foremost scientific minds, however, was Claude Bernard
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: (1813-1878), a friend of Renan, who held the Chair of Medicine at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: College de France, and was, in addition, the Professor of Physiology
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: at the Facult<e9> des Sciences at the Sorbonne. Science, Bernard
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: maintained, concerns itself only with phenomena and their laws. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: endeavoured in his celebrated _Introduction <e0> l'Etude de la M<e9>d<e9>cine
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: exp<e9>rimentale_, published in 1865, to establish the science of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: physiology upon a sound basis, having respect only to fact, not owning
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: homage to theories of a metaphysical character or to the authority of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: persons or creeds. He desired to obtain by such a rigorous and precise
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: method, objectivity. "The experimental method is," he insists, "the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: really scientific method, which proclaims the freedom of the human
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spirit and its intelligence. It not only shakes off the yoke of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: metaphysics and of theology, in addition it refuses to admit personal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: considerations and subjective standpoints."_*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : _Introduction <e0> l'Etude de la M<e9>d<e9>cine exp<e9>rimentale_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: chap. ii, sect. 4]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Bernard's attitude is distinctly that of a positivist, and the general
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tone of his remarks as well as his attitude on many special points
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: agrees with that of Comte. His conclusions regarding physiology are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: akin to those expressed by Comte concerning biology. Bernard ex-*
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: *cludes any metaphysical hypothesis such as the operation of a vital
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: principle, and adheres strictly to physicochemical formulas. He
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: accepts, however, Comte's warning about the reduction of the higher to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: terms of the lower, or, in Spencerian phraseology, the explanation of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the more complex by the less complex. Consequently, he carefully
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: avoids the statement that he desires to "reduce" physiology to physics
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and chemistry. He makes no facile and light-hearted transition as did
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Spencer; on the contrary, he claims that the living has some specific
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: quality which cannot be "reduced" to other terms, and which cannot be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: summed up in the formulae of physics or chemistry. The physiologist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and the medical practitioner must never overlook the fact that every
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: living being forms an organism and an individuality. The physiologist,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: continues Bernard, must take notice of this unity or harmony of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: whole, even while he penetrates the interior to know the mechanism of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: each of its parts. The physicist and the chemist can ignore any notion
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of final causes in the facts they observe, but the physiologist must
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: admit a harmonious finality, a harmony pre-established in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander
