title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: false, for however largely a community exhibits a general likeness to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: an organism, it is a superficial resemblance. There is not a centre of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: consciousness, but a multitude of such centres each living an inner
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: life of personal experience which is peculiarly its own; and these
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: personalities, we must remember, are not simply a homogeneous mass of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: social matter, they are capable of realising the good each in his or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: her own manner. This is the only realisation of the good.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In this chapter we have traced the attempt to reconcile _science et
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: conscience_, after the way had been opened up by the maintenance of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: freedom. It was recognised that reason is not entirely pure
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: speculation: it is also practical. Human nature seeks for goodness as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: well as for truth. It is noticeable that while the insistence upon the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: primacy of the practical reason developed, on the one hand, into a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy of action (anti-intellectual action in its extreme
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: development as shown in Syndicalism), the same tendency, operating in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a different manner and upon different data, essayed to find in action,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and in the belief which arises from action, that Absolute or Ideal to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which the pure reason feels it cannot alone attain--namely, the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: realisation of God. To this problem of religion we devote our next
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: chapter.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: CHAPTER VII
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: RELIGION
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: IT is outside our purpose to embark upon discussions of the religious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problem in France, in so far as this became a problem of politics. Our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intention is rather to examine the inner core of religious thought,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the philosophy of religion, which forms an appropriate final chapter
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to our history of the development of ideas.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Yet, although our discussion bears mainly upon the general attitude to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religion, upon the development of central religious ideas such as the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idea of God, and upon the place of religion in the future--that is to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: say, upon the philosophy of religion--it is practically impossible to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: understand the religious attitude of our thinkers without a brief
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: notice of the religious situation in France during the nineteenth and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: twentieth centuries.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In our Introduction we briefly called attention to the attempt of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Traditionalists after the Revolution to recall their countrymen to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Christian faith as presented in and by the Roman Catholic Church. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: efforts made by De Bonald, De Maistre, Chateaubriand, Lamennais and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Lacordaire did not succeed as they had hoped, but, nevertheless, a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: considerable current of loyalty to the Church and the Catholic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religion set in. Much of this loyalty was bound up with sentimental
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: affection for a monarchy, and arose partly from anti-revolutionary
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sentiments._*_ It cannot, however, be entirely explained by these
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: political feelings. There was the expression of a deeper and more
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritual reaction directed against the materialistic and sceptical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: teachings of the eighteenth century. Man's heart craved comfort,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: consolation and warmth. It had been starved in the previous century,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and revolution and war had only added to the cup of bitterness. Thus
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: there came an epoch of Romanticism in religion of which the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sentimental and assumed orthodoxy of Chateaubriand was a sign of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: times. His _G<e9>nie du Christianisme_ may now appear to us full of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sentimentality, but it was welcomed at the time, since it expressed at
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: least some of those aspirations which had for long been denied an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: expression. It was this which marked the great difference between the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: two centuries in France. The eighteenth was mainly concerned with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: scoffing at religion. Its rationalism was that of Voltaire. In the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: first half of the nineteenth century the pendulum swung in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: opposite direction. Romanticism, in poetry, in literature, in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy and in religion was _<e0> la mode_, and it led frequently to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sentimentality or morbidity. Lamartine, Victor Hugo and De Vigny
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: professed the Catholic faith for many years. We may note, and this is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: important, that in France the only form of Christianity which holds
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: any sway over the people in general is the Roman Catholic faith.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Outside the Roman Church there is no religious organisation which is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of much account. This explains why it is so rare to find a thinker who
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: owns allegiance to any Church or religion, and yet it would be wrong
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to deem them irreligious. There is no _via media_ between Catholicism
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and free personal thought. This was a point which Renan quite keenly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: felt, and of which his own spiritual pilgrimage, which took him out of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the bounds of the Church of his youth, is a fine illustration. Many of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: France's noblest sons have been brought up in the religious atmosphere
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the Church and owe much of their education to her, and Rome
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: believes in education. The control of education has been throughout
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the century a problem severely contested by Church and State. More
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: important for our purpose than the details of the quarrels of Church
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and State is the intellectual condition of the Church itself.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : De Maistre regarded the Revolution as an infliction
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: specially bestowed upon France for her national neglect of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religion--his religion, of course. The same crude, misleading, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: vicious arguments have since been put forward by the theologians in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: their efforts to push the cause of the Church with the people. This
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was very noticeable both in the war of 1870 and that of 1914. In each
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: case it was argued that the war was a punishment from God for France's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: frivolity and neglect of the Church. In 1914, in addition, it was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: deemed a direct divine reply to "Disestablishment."]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This reveals a striking vitality, a vigour and initiative at war with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the central powers of the Vatican, a seething unrest which uniformity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and authority find annoying. How strong the power of the central
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: authority was, the affair of the Concordat had shown, when forty
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: bishops were deposed for non-acceptance of the arrangement between
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Napoleon and the Pope._*_ Stronger still was the iron hand of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Pope over intellectual freedom.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : The Revolution had separated Church and State and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: suppressed clerical privilege by the "Civil Constitution of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Clergy" enactment of 1790. Napoleon, alive to the patriotic value of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: State Church, repealed this law and declared the divorce of Church and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: State to be null and void. His negotiations with the Pope (Pius VII.)
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: resulted, in 1801, in the arrangement known as the _Concordat_, by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which the Roman Catholic Church was again made the established
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: national Church, its clergy became civil servants paid by the State,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and its worship became a branch of public administration.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Lamennais was not a "modernist," as this term is now understood, for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his theology was orthodox. His fight with the Vatican was for freedom
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in the relations of the Church to society. He pleaded in his _Essai
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sur I'lndifference en Mati<e8>re de Religion_ for the Church to accept
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the principle of freedom, to leave the cherished fondling of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: royalist cause, and to present to the world the principles of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Christian democracy. Lamennais and other liberal-minded men desired
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the separation of Church and State, and were tolerant of those who
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: were not Catholic. They claimed, along with their own "right to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: believe," that of others "not to believe." His was a liberal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Catholicism, but its proposals frightened his co-religionists, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: drew upon him in 1832 an encyclical letter (_Mirari vos_) from the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Vatican. The Pope denounced liberalism absolutely as an absurd and an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: erroneous doctrine, a piece of folly sprung from the "fetid source of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: indifferentism." Lamennais found he could not argue, as Renan himself
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: later put it, "with a bar of iron." It was the reactionary De Maistre,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with his principle of papal authority,_*_ and not Lamennais, whom
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Vatican, naturally enough, chose to favour, or rather to follow.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : As stated in _Du Pape_, 1819.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Thus Lamennais found himself, by an almost natural and inevitable
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: process, outside the Church, and this in spite of the fact that his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: theology was orthodox. He endeavoured to present his case in his paper
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _L'Avenir_ and in an influential brochure, _The Words of a Believer_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which left its mark upon Hugo, Michelet, Lamartine, and George Sand.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: His views blended with the current of humanitarian and democratic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrines which developed from the Saint-Simonists, Pierre Leroux and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: similar thinkers. We have already noted that these social reformers
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: held to their beliefs with the conviction that in them and not in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Roman Church lay salvation.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This brings us to a crucial point which is the clue to much of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: subsequent thought upon religion. This is the profound and seemingly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: irreconcilable difference between these two conceptions of religion.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The orthodox Catholic faith believes in a supernatural revelation, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is firmly convinced that man is inherently vile and corrupt, born in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sin from which he cannot be redeemed, save by the mystical operations
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of divine grace, working only through the holy sacraments and clergy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the one true Church, to whom all power was given, according to its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: view, by the historic Jesus. Its methods are conservative, its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: discipline rigid and based on tradition and authority. Its system of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: salvation is excessively individualistic. It holds firmly to this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pessimistic view of human nature, based on the doctrine of original
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sin, thus maintaining a creed which, in the hands of a devoted clergy,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: who are free from domestic ties, works as a powerful moral force upon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the individual believer. His freedom of thought is restricted; he can
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: neither read nor think what he likes, and the Church, having made the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thirteenth-century doctrines of Aquinas its official philosophy, hurls
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: anathema at ideas scientific, political, philosophical or theological
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which have appeared since. No half-measures are allowed: either one is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a loyal Catholic or one is not a Catholic at all. In this relentlessly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: uncompromising attitude lies the main strength of Catholicism; herein
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: also is contained its weakness, or at least that element which makes
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it manufacture its own greatest adversaries.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: While claiming to be the one Church of Jesus Christ, it does not by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: any means put him in the foreground of its religion. Its hierarchy of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: saints is rather a survival of polytheism; its worship of the Virgin
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and cult of the _Sacr<e9> Cur_ issue often in a religious sentimentality
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and sensuality promoted by the denial of a more healthy outlet for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: instincts which are an essential part of human nature. Tribute,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: however, must be paid--high tribute-- to the devotion of individuals,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: particularly to the work done by the religious orders of women, whose
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: devotion the Church having won by its intense appeal to women keeps,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: consecrates and organises in a manner which no other Church has
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: succeeded in doing. This is largely the secret of the vigorous life of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Church, for as a power of charity the Roman Church is remarkable
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and deserves respect. Her educational efforts, her missions,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: hospitals, her humbler clergy, and her orders which offer opportunity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of service or of sanctuary to all types of human nature--these
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: constitute Roman Catholicism in a truer manner than the diplomacy of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Jesuits or the councils of the Vatican. It is this pulsing human
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: heart of hers which keeps her alive, not the rigid intellectual
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dogmatism and antiquated theology which she expounds, nor her loyalty
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the established political order, which, siding with the rich and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: powerful, frequently gives to this professedly spiritual power a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: debasing taint of materialism.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Against all this, and in vital opposition to this, we have the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: humanitarians who, rejecting the doctrine of corruption, believe that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: human instincts and human reason themselves make for goodness and for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: God. While Catholicism looks to the past, humanitarianism looks
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: forward, believes in freedom and in progress, and regards the immanent
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Christ-spirit as working in mankind. Its gospel is one of love and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: brotherhood, a romantic doctrine issuing in love and pity for the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: oppressed and the sinful. In the collective consciousness of mankind
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it sees the incarnation, the growth of the immanent God. Therefore it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: claims that in democracy, socialism and world brotherhood lies the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: true Christianity. This, the humanitarians claim, is the true
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religious idealism--that which was preached by the Founder himself and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which his Church has betrayed. The humanitarians make service to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mankind the essence of religion, and regard themselves as more truly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Christian than the Church.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: In those countries where Protestantism has a large following, the two
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: doctrines of humanitarian optimism and of the orthodox pessimism
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: regarding human nature are confused vaguely together. The English mind
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in particular is able to compromise and to blend the two conflicting
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophies in varying degrees; but in the French mind its clearer
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: penetration and more logical acumen prevent this. The Frenchman is an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idealist and tends to extremes, either that of whole-hearted devotion
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to a dominating Church or that of the abandonment of organised
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religion. In Protestantism he sees only a halfway house, built upon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the first principles of criticism, and unwilling to pursue those
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: principles to their conclusion-- namely, the rejection of all
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: organised Church religion, the adoption of perfect freedom for the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: individual in all matters of belief, a religion founded on freedom and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: on personal thought which alone is free.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Such were the two dominant notes in religious thought in France at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: opening of our period.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Catholicism resisted the humanitarianism of 1848 and strengthened its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: power after the _coup d'<e9>tat_. The Church and the Vatican became more
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: staunch in their opposition to all doctrines of modern thought. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French clergy profited by the alliance with the aristocracy, while
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religious orders, particularly the Jesuits, increased in number and in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: power. Veuillot proclaimed the virtues of Catholicism in his writings.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Meanwhile the Pope's temporal power decreased, but his spiritual power
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was increasing in extent and in intensity. Centralisation went on
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: within the Church, and Rome (_i.e._, the Pope and the Vatican) became
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: all-powerful.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Just after the half-century opens the Pope (Pius IX.), in 1854,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: proclaimed his authority in announcing the dogma of the Immaculate
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Conception of the Virgin Mary._*_ As France had heard the sentence,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _L'Etat, c'est moi_, from the lips of one of its greatest monarchs, it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: now heard from another quarter a similar principle enunciated,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: L'Eglise, c'est moi. As democracy and freedom cried out against the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: one, they did so against the other. Undaunted, the Vatican continued
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in its absolutism, even although it must have seen that in some
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: quarters revolt would be the result. Ten years later the Pope attacked
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the whole of modern thought, to which he was diametrically opposed, in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his encyclical _Quanta Cura_ and in his famous _Syllabus_, which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: constituted a catalogue of the modern errors and heresies which he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: condemned. This famous challenge was quite clear and uncompromising in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: its attitude, concluding with a curse upon "him who should maintain
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that the Roman Pontiff can, and must, be reconciled and compromise
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with progress, liberalism and modern civilisation!" To the doctrine of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _L'Eglise, c'est moi_ had now been added that of _La Science, aussi,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: c'est moi_. This was not all. In 1870 the dogma of Papal Infallibility
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was proclaimed. By a strange irony of history, however, this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: declaration of spiritual absolutism was followed by an entire loss of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: temporal power. The outbreak of the war in that same year between
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: France and Prussia led to the hasty withdrawal of French troops from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Papal Domain and the Eternal City fell to the secular power of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Italian national army under Victor Emmanuel.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : This new dogma of the Immaculate Conception of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Virgin must not, of course, be confused, as it often is by those
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: outside the Catholic Church, with the quite different and more ancient
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: proposition which asserts the Virgin Birth of Jesus.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The defeat of France at the hands of Prussia in 1871 issued in a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: revival of religious sentiment, frequently seen in defeated nations. A
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: special mission or crusade of national repentance gathered in large
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: subscriptions which built the enormous Church of the Sacr<e9> Coeur
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: overlooking Paris from the heights of Montmartre._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : The anti-Catholic element, however, have had the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: audacity, and evidently the legal right, to place a statue to a man
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: who, some centuries back, was burned at the stake for failing to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: salute a religious procession, in such a position immediately in front
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of this great church that the plan for the large staircase cannot be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: carried out.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Seeking for religious consolation, the French people found a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Catholicism which had become embittered and centralised for warfare
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upon liberal religion and humanitarianism. They found that the only
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: organised religion they knew was dominated by the might of Rome and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the powers of the clergy. These even wished France, demoralised as she
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was for the moment, to undertake the restoration of the Pope's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: temporal power in Italy. Further, they were definitely in favour of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: monarchy: "the altar and the throne" were intimately associated in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ecclesiastical mind.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It was the realisation of this which prompted Gambetta to cry out to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Third Republic with stern warning, "Clericalism is your enemy."
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Thus began the political fight for which Rome had been strengthening
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: herself. With the defeat of the clerical-monarchy party in 1877 the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: safety of the Republic was assured. From then until 1905 the Republic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and the Church fought each other. Educational questions were bitterly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: contested (1880). The power of the Jesuits, especially, was regarded
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as a con-* stant menace to the State. The Dreyfus affair (1894- 1899)
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: did not improve relations, with its intense anti-semitism and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: anti-clericalism. The battle was only concluded by the legislation of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Waldeck-Rousseau in 1901 and Combes in 1903, expelling religious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: orders. Combes himself had studied for the priesthood and was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: violently anti-clerical. The culmination came in the Separation Law of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1905 carried by Briand, in the Pope's protest against this, followed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by the Republic's confiscation of much Church property, a step which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: might have been avoided if the French Catholics had been allowed to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: have their way in an arrangement with the State regarding their
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: churches. This was prevented by the severance of diplomatic relations
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: between France and the Vatican and by the Pope's disagreement with the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French Catholics whose wishes he ignored in his policy of definite
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: hostility to the French Government._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Relations with the Vatican, which were seen to be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: desirable during the Great European War, have since been resumed (in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1921) by the Republic.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: During our period a popular semi-nationalist and semi-religious cult
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of Jeanne d'Arc, "the Maid of Orleans," appeared in France. The clergy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: expressly encouraged this, with the definite object of enlisting
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sentiments of nationality and patriotism on the side of the Church.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Ecclesiastical diplomacy at headquarters quickly realised the use
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which might be made of this patriotic figure whom, centuries before,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Church had thought fit to burn as a witch. The Vatican saw a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: possibility of blending French patriotism with devotion to Catholicism
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and thus possibly strengthening, in the eyes of the populace at least,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the waning cause of the Church.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The adoration of Jeanne d'Arc was approved as early as 1894, but when
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Church found itself in a worse plight with its relation to the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: State, it made preparations in 1903 for her enrolment among the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: saints._/-_ She was honoured the following year with the title of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "Venerable," but in 1908, after the break of Church and State, she was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: accorded the full status of a saint, and her statue, symbolic of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: patriotism militant, stands in most French churches as conspicuous
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: often as that of the Virgin, who, in curious contrast, fondles the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: young child, and expresses the supreme loveliness of motherhood._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The cult of Jeanne d'Arc flourished particularly in 1914 on the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sentiments of patriotism, militarism and religiosity then current.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This was natural because it is for these very sentiments that she
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: stands as a symbol. She is evidently a worthy goddess whose worship is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: worth while, for we are assured that it was through _her_ beneficent
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: efforts that the German Army retired from Paris in 1914 and again in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1918. The saintly maid of Orleans reappeared and beat them back! Such
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is the power of the "culte" which the Church eagerly fosters. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Sacr<e9> Coeur also has its patriotic and military uses, figuring as it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: did as an emblem on some regimental flags on the battlefield.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Meanwhile, the celebrations of Napoleon's centenary (1921) give rise
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the conjecture that he, too, will in time rank with Joan of Arc as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a saint. His canonisation would achieve absolutely that union of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: patriotic and religious sentimentality to which the Church in France
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: directs its activities.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_: It is interesting to observe the literature on Jeanne
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: d'Arc published at this time: Anatole France, _Vie de Jeanne d'Arc_ (2
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: vols., 1908); Durand, _Jeanne d'Arc et l'Eglise_ (1908). These are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: noteworthy, also Andrew Lang's work, _The Maid of Orleans_ (also
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Herein, undoubtedly, lies the strong appeal of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Church to women.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The vast majority of the 39,000,000 French people are at least
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: nominally Catholic, even if only from courtesy or from a utilitarian
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: point of view. Only about one in sixty of the population are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Protestant. Although among cultured conservatives there is a real
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: devotion to the Church, the creed of France is in general something
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: far more broad and human than Catholicism, in spite of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tremendously human qualities which that Church possesses. The creed of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: France is summed up better in art, nature, beauty, music, science, _la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: patrie_, humanity, in the worship of life itself._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Those who desire to study the religious psychology of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: France during our period cannot find a better revelation than that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: given in the wonderful novel by Roger Martin du Card, entitled Jean
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Barois.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: I
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It was against such a background of ecclesiastical and political
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: affairs that the play of ideas upon religion went on. Such was the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: environment, the tradition which surrounded our thinkers, and we may
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: very firmly claim that only by a recognition that their religious and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: national _milieu_ was of such a type as we have outlined, can the real
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: significance of their religious thought be understood. Only when we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: have grasped the essential attitude of authority and tradition of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Roman Church, its ruthless attitude to modern thought of all kinds,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: can we understand the religious attitude of men like Renan, Renouvier
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Guyau.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We are also enabled to see why the appeal of the Saint-Simonist group
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: could present itself as a religious and, indeed, Christian appeal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: outside the Church. It enables us to understand why Cousin's
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualism pleased neither the Catholics nor their opponents, and to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: realise why the "Religion of Humanity," which Auguste Comte
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: inaugurated, made so little appeal._/-_ This has been well styled
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: an "inverted Catholicism," since it endeavours to preserve the ritual
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of that religion and to embody the doctrines of humanitarianism.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Naturally enough it drew upon itself the scorn of both these groups.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The Catholic saw in it only blasphemy: the humanitarian saw no way in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which it might further his ends.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _/-_ : Littr<e9>, his disciple, as we have already noted,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rejected this part of his master's teaching. Littr<e9> was opposed by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Robinet, who laid the stress upon the "Religion of Humanity" as the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: crown of Comte's work.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Comte's attempt to base his new religion upon Catholicism was quite
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: deliberate, for he strove to introduce analogies with "everything
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: great and deep which the Catholic system of the Middle Ages effected
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: or even projected." He offered a new and fantastic trinity, compiled a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: calendar of renowned historical personalities, to replace that of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unknown saints. He proclaimed "positive dogmas "and aspired to all the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: authority and infallibility of the Roman Pontiff, supported by a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: trained clergy, whose word should be law. Curiously enough he, too,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: had his anathemas, in that he had days set apart for the solemn
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cursing of the great enemies of the human race, such as Napoleon. It
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was indeed a reversed Catholicism, offering a fairly good caricature
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the methods of the Roman Church, and it was equally obnoxious in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: its tyrannical attitude._*_ While it professed to express humanity
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and love as its central ideas it proceeded to outline a method which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is the utter negation of these. Comte made the great mistake of not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: realising that loyalty to these ideals must involve spiritual freedom,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and that the religion of humanity must be a collective inspiration of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: free individuals, who will in love and fellowship tolerate differences
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upon metaphysical questions. Uniformity can only be mischievous.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : Guyau's criticisms of Comte's "Religion of Humanity"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in his _L'Irreligion de l'Avenir_ are interesting. "The marriage of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positive science and blind sentiment cannot produce religion" (p. 314;
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Eng. trans., p. 366). "Comtism, which consists of the rites of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religion and nothing else, is an attempt to maintain life in the body
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: after the departure of the soul" (p. 307; Eng. trans., p. 359).]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It was because he grasped this vital point that Renan's discussion of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the religious question is so instructive. For him, religion is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: essentially an affair of personal taste. Here we have another
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: indication of the clear way in which Renan was able to discern the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tendencies of his time. He published his _Etudes d'Histoire religieuse_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in 1857, and his Preface to the _Nouvelles Etudes d'Histoire
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religieuse_ was written in 1884. He claims there that freedom is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: essential to religion, and that it is absolutely necessary that the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: State should have no power whatever over it. Religion is as personal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and private a matter as taste in literature or art. There should be no
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: State laws, he claims, relating to religion at all, any more than
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dress is prescribed for citizens by law. He well points out that only
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a State which is strictly neutral in religion can ever be absolutely
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: free from playing the _r<f4>le_ of persecutor. The favouring of one sect
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: will entail some persecution or hardship upon others. Further, he sees
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the iniquity of taxing the community to pay the expenses of clergy to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: whose teachings they may object, or whose doctrines are not theirs.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Freedom, Renan believed, would claim its own in the near future and,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: denouncing the Concordat, he prophesied the abolition of the State
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Church.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The worst type of organisation Renan holds to be the theocratic state,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: like Islam, or the ancient Pontifical State in which dogma reigns
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: supreme. He condemns also the State whose religion is based upon the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: profession of a majority of its citizens. There should be, as Spinoza
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: was wont to style it, "liberty of philosophising." The days of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dominance of dogma are passing, in many quarters gone by already,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "Religion has become for once and all a matter of personal taste."
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renan himself was deeply religious in mind. He was never an atheist
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and did not care for the term "free-thinker" because of its implied
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: associations with the irreligion of the previous century. He stands
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: out, however, not only in our period of French thought, but in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: world development of the century as one of the greatest masters of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religious criticism. His historical work is important, and he
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: possessed a knowledge and equipment for that task. His distinguished
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Semitic scholarship led to his obtaining the chair of Hebrew at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Coll<e8>ge de France, and enabled him to write his Histories, one of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Jews and one of Christianity.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It was as a volume of this _Histoire des Origines du Christianisme_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that his _Vie de J<e9>sus_ appeared in 1863. This life of the Founder of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Christianity produced a profound stir in the camps of religious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: orthodoxy, and drew upon its author severe criticisms. Apart from the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: particular views set forth in that volume, we must remember that the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: very fact of his writing upon "a sacred subject," which was looked
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander
