title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: together with the multitude of thinking men and women they represent,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: may be seen the two tendencies-- one conservative, strengthening its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: internal organisation and authority, in defiance of all the influences
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of modern thought, the other a free and personal effort, issuing in a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: genuine humanising of religion and freeing it from ecclesiasticism and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dogma.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: A word may be said here, however, with reference to the "Modernists."
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The Modernist movement is a French product, the result of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: interaction of modern philosophical and scientific ideas upon the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: teaching of the Roman Church. It has produced a philosophical religion
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which owes much to Oll<e9>-Laprune and Blondel, and is in reality modern
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: science with a veneer of religious idealism or platonism. It is a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: theological compromise, and has no affinities with the efforts of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Lamennais. As a compromise it was really opposed to the traditions of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the French, to whose love of sharp and clear thinking such general and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rather vague syntheses are unacceptable. It must be admitted, however,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that there is a concreteness, a nearness to reality and life, which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: separates it profoundly from the highly abstract theology of Germany,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as seen in Ritschl and Harnack.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The Abb<e9> Marat of the Theological School at the Sorbonne and Father
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Gratry of the Ecole Normale were the initiators of this movement, as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: far back as the Second Empire. "Modernism" was never a school of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought, philosophical or religious, and it showed itself in a freedom
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and life, a spirit rather than in any formula;. As Sorel's syndicalism
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is an application of the Bergsonian and kindred doctrines to the left
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: wings, and issues in a social theory of "action," so Modernism is an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attempt to apply them to the right and issues in a religion founded on
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: action rather than theology. The writings of the Modernists are
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: extensive, but we mention the names of the chief thinkers. There is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the noted exegetist Loisy, who was dismissed in 1894 from the Catholic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Institute of Paris and now holds the chair of the History of Reli-*
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: gions at the College de France. His friend, the Abb<e9> Bourier,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: maintained the doctrine, " Where Christ is there is the Church," with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a view to insisting upon the importance of being a Christian rather
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: than a Catholic or a Protestant.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The importance of the Catholic thinker, Blondel, both for religion and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for philosophy, has already been indicated at an earlier stage in this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: book. His work inspires most.Modernist thought. Blondel preaches, with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: great wealth of philosophical and psychological argument, the great
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Catholic doctrine of the collaboration of God with man and of man with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: God. Man at one with himself realises his highest aspirations. Divine
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: transcendence and divine immanence in man are reconciled. God and man,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in this teaching, are brought together, and the stern realism of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: every-day life and the idealism of religion unite in a sacramental
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: union. The supreme principle in this union Laberthonni<e8>re shows to be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Love. He is at pains to make clear, however, that belief in Love as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the ultimate reality is no mere sentimentality, no mere assertion of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the will-to-believe. For him the intellect must play its part in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religious life and in the expression of faith. No profounder
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intellectual judgment exists than just the one which asserts "God is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Love," when this statement is properly apprehended and its momentous
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: significance clearly realised. We cannot but lament, with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Laberthonni<e8>re, the abuse of this proposition and its subsequent loss
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of both appeal and meaning through a shallow familiarity. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reiteration of great conceptions, which is the method by which the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: great dogmas have been handed down from generations, tends to blurr
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: their real significance. They become stereotyped and empty of life. It
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is for this reason that Le Roy in _Dogme et Critique_ (1907) insisted
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: upon the advisability of regarding all dogmas as expressions of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: practical value in and for action, rather than as intellectual
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: propositions of a purely "religious" or ecclesiastical type, belonging
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: solely to the creeds.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: To Blondel, Laberthonni<e8>re, and Le Roy can be added the names of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Fonsegrive, Sertillanges, Loyson and Houtin, the last two of whom
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ultimately left the Church, for the Church made up its mind to crush
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Modernism. The Pope had intimated in 1879 that the thirteenth-century
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy of Aquinas was to be recognised as the only official
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy._*_ Finally, Modernism was condemned in a Vatican
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: encyclical (_Pascendi Dominici Gregis_) in 1907, as was also the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: social and educational effort, _Le Sillon_.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : This led to revival of the study of the _Summa
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Theologi<e6>_ and to the commencement of the review of Catholic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy, _Revue Thomiste_.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Such has been Rome's last word, and it is not surprising, therefore,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that France is the most ardent home of free thought upon religious
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: matters, that the French people display a spirit which is unable to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: stop at Protestantism, but which heralds the religion or the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _non-religion_ of the future to which Guyau has so powerfully
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: indicated the tendencies and has by so doing helped, in conjunction
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with Renan and Renouvier, to hasten its realisation.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: A parallel to the "modernist" theology of the Catholic thinkers was
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: indicated on the Protestant side by the theology of Auguste Sabatier,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: whose _Esquisse d'une Philosophie de la Religion d'apr<e8>s la
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Psychologie et l'Histoire_ appeared in 1897_/-_ and of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Menegoz,_/=_ whose _Publications diverges sur le Fid<e9>isme et son
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Application a l'Enseignement chr<e9>tien traditionnel_ were issued in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: 1900. Sabatier assigns the beginning of religion to man's trouble and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: distress of heart caused by his aspirations, his belief in ideals and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: higher values, being at variance with his actual condition. Religion
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: arises from this conflict of real and ideal in the soul of man. This
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is the essence of religion which finds its expression in the life of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: faith rather than in the formation of beliefs which are themselves
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: accidental and transitory, arising from environment and education,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: changing in form from aee to age both in the individual and the race.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: While LeRoy on the Catholic side, maintained that dogmas were valuable
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for their practical significance, Sabatier and M<e9>n<e9>goz claimed that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: all religious knowledge is symbolical. Dogmas are but symbols, which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: inadequately attempt to reveal their object. That object can only be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: grasped by "faith" as distinct from "belief"--that is to say, by an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attitude in which passion, instinct and intuition blend and not by an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attitude which is purely one of intellectual conviction. This doctrine
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of "salvation by faith independently of beliefs" has a marked
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: relationship not only to pragmatism and the philosophy of action, but
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the philosophy of intuition. A similar anti-intellectualism colours
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the "symbolo-fid<e9>ist" currents within Catholicism, which manifest a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: more extreme character. A plea voiced against all such tendencies is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to be found in Bois' book, _De la Connaissance religieuse_ (1894),
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: where an endeavour is made to retain a more intellectual attitude, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it again found expression in the volume by Boutroux, written as late
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: as 1908, which deals with the religious problem in our period.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _Les Religions d'Authorit<e9> et la Religion de l'Esprit_, 1904.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte

text: Theology in Paris, not Ferdinand M<e9>n<e9>goz, his nephew, who is also a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
