text: Professor of Theology now at Strasbourg.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Quoting Boehme in the interesting conclusion to this book on _Science
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Religion in Contemporary Philosophy_ (1908) Boutroux sums up in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the words of the old German mystic his attitude to the diversity of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: religious opinions. "Consider the birds in our forests, they praise
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: God each in his own way, in diverse tones and fashions. Think you God
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is vexed by this diversity and desires to silence discordant voices?
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: All the forms of being are dear to the infinite Being himself!"_*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : It is interesting to compare with the above the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sentiments expressed in Matthew Arnold's poem, entitled Progress:
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "Children of men! the unseen Power, whose eye
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: For ever doth accompany mankind,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Hath look'd on no religion scornfully
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: That men did ever find.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This survey of the general attitude adopted towards religion and the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: problems which it presents only serves to emphasise more clearly those
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tendencies which we have already denoted in previous chapters. As the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: discussion of progress was radically altered by the admission of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: principle of freedom, and the discussion of ethics passes bevond rigid
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: formulae to a freer conception of morality, so here in religion the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: insistence upon freedom and that recognition of personality which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: accompanies it, colours the whole religious outlook. Renan, Renouvier
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and Guyau, the three thinkers who have most fully discussed religion
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in our period, join in proclaiming the importance of the personal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: factor in religious belief, and in valiant opposition to that Church
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which is the declared enemy of freedom, they urge that in freedom of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought lies the course of all religious development in the future,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for only thus can be expressed the noblest and highest aspirations of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: man's spirit.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: CONCLUSION
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: THE foregoing pages have been devoted to a history of ideas rather
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: than to the maintenance of any special thesis or particular argument.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Consequently it does not remain for us to draw any definitely logical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: conclusions from the preceding chapters. The opportunity may be justly
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: taken, however, of summing up the general features of the development.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Few periods in the history of human thought can rival in interest that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the second half of the nineteenth century in France. The discussion
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: covers the principal problems with which man's mind is occupied in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: modern times and presents these in a manner which is distinctly human
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and not merely national. This alone would give value to the study of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: such a period. There is, however, to be added the more striking fact
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that there is a complete "turning of the tide" manifested during these
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: fifty years in the attitude to most of the problems. Beginning with an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: overweening confidence in science and a belief in determinism and in a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: destined progress, the century closed with a complete reversal of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: these conceptions.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Materialism and naturalism are both recognised as inadequate, a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reaction sets in against positivism and culminates in the triumph of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualism or idealism. This idealism is free from the cruder
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: aspects of the Kantian or Hegelian philosophy. The Thing-in-itself and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Absolute are abandoned; relativity is proclaimed in knowledge, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: freedom in the world of action. Thoughts or ideas show themselves as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: forces operating in the evolution of history. This is maintained in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: opposition to the Marxian doctrine of the purely economic or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: materialistic determination of history. A marked tendency, however, is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: manifested to regard all problems from a social stand point. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dogmatic confidence in science gives way to a more philosophical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attitude, while the conflict of science and religion resolves itself
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: into a decay of dogma and the conception of a free religion.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We have indicated the problem presented by "_science et conscience_,"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and in so far as we have laid down any thesis or argument in these
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: pages, as distinct from an historical account of the development, that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thesis has been, that the central problem in the period was that of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: freedom. It was to this point which the consideration of science, or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rather of the sciences, led us. We have observed the importance of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sciences for philosophy, and it is clear that, so far from presenting
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: any real hostility to philosophy, it can acclaim their autonomy and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: freedom, without attempting by abstract methods to absorb them into
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: itself. They are equally a concrete part of human thought, and in a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: deep and real sense a manifestation of the same spirit which animates
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: By recognising the sciences philosophy can avoid the fallacy of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ideology on the one hand and naturalism on the other. Unlike the old
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: eclecticism, the new thought is able to take account of science and to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: criticise its assertions. We have seen how this has been accomplished,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and the rigidly mechanical view of the world abandoned for one into
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which human freedom enters as a real factor. This transforms the view
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of history and shows us human beings creating that history and not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: merely being its blind puppets. History offers no cheerful outlook for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the easy-going optimist; it is not any more to be regarded as mere
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: data for pessimistic reflections, but rather a record which prompts a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: feeling of responsibility. The world is not ready-made, and if there
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is to be progress it must be willed by us and achieved by our struggle
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and labour.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The doctrine of immanence upon which the modern tendency is to insist,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in place of the older idea of transcendence, makes us feel, not only
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that we are free, but that our freedom is not in opposition to, or in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spite of, the divine spirit, but is precisely an expression of divine
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: immanence. Instead of the gloomy conception of a whole which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: determines itself apart from us, we feel ourselves part, and a very
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: responsible part, of a reality which determines itself collectively
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and creatively by its own action, by its own ideals, which it has
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: itself created. This freedom must extend not only to our conceptions
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of history but also to those of ethics and of religion.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "English philosophy ends in considering nature as an assemblage of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: facts; German philosophy looks upon it chiefly as a system of laws. If
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: there is a place midway between the two nations it belongs to us
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Frenchmen. We applied the English ideas in the eighteenth century; we
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: can in the nineteenth give precision to the German ideas. What we have
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to do is to temper, amend and complete the two spirits, one by the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: other, to fuse them into one, to express them in a style that shall be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intelligible to everybody and thus to make of them the universal
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spirit."
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Such was Taine's attitude, and it indicates clearly the precise
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: position of French thought. We are apt to consider Taine purely as an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: empiricist, but we must remember that he disagreed with the radical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: empiricism of John Stuart Mill. His own attitude was largely that of a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reaction against the vague spiritualism of the Eclectic School,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: especially Cousin's eclecticism, a foreign growth on French soil, due
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to German influence. The purely _a priori_ constructions of the older
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualism could find no room, and allowed none, for the sciences.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This was sufficient to doom it, and to lead naturally to a reaction of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a positive kind, revolting from all _a priori_ constructions.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It was to combat the excessive positive reaction against metaphysics
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that Renouvier devoted his energies, but while professing to modernise
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Kant and to follow out the general principles of his Critical
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Philosophy, Renouvier was further removed from the German thinker than
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: he at times seems to have observed. Renouvier must undoubtedly share
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with Comte the honours of the century in French Philosophy. Many
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: influences, however, prevented the general or speedy acceptance of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier's doctrines. The University was closed against him, as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: against Comte. He worked in isolation and his style of presentation,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which is heavy and laborious, does not appeal to the _esprit_ of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French mind. Probably, too, his countrymen's ignorance of Kant at the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: time Renouvier wrote his _Essais de Critique g<e9>n<e9>rale_ prevented an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: understanding and appreciation of the neo-critical advance on
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Criticism.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Renouvier commands respect, but he does not appear to be in the line
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of development which manifests so essentially the character of French
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thought. This is to be found rather in that spiritualism, which,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: unlike the old, does not exclude science, but welcomes it, finds a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: place for it, although not by any means an exclusive place. The new
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spiritualists did not draw their inspiration, as did Cousin, from any
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: German source, their initial impulse is derived from a purely French
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thinker, Maine de Biran, who, long neglected, came to recognition in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the work of Ravaisson and those subsequent thinkers of this group,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: right up to Bergson.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This current of thought is marked by a vitality and a concreteness
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which are a striking contrast to the older eclectic spiritualism.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Having submitted itself to the discipline of the sciences, it is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: acquainted with their methods and data in a manner which enables it to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: oppose the dogmatism of science, and to acclaim the reality of values
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: other than those which are purely scientific. Ignoring _a priori_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: construction, or eclectic applications of doctrines, it investigates
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the outer world of nature and the inner life of the spirit.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: We have said that these ideas are presented, not merely from a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: national standpoint, but from one which is deeply human and universal.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: "_La Science_," re-marked Pasteur, "_n'a pas de patrie_." We may add
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that philosophy, too, owns no special fatherland. There is not in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy, any more than in religion, "a chosen people," even
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: although the Jews of old thought themselves such, and among moderns
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the Germans have had this conceit about their _Kultur_. In so far as
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy aims at the elucidation of a true view of the universe, it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thereby tends inevitably to universality. But just as a conception of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: internationalism, which should fail to take into account the factors
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of nationality, would be futile and disastrous, so a conception of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: evolution of thought must likewise estimate the characteristics which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: nationality produces even in the philosophical field.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Such characteristics, it will be found, are not definite doctrines,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: for these may be transferred, as are scientific discoveries, from one
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: nation to another, and absorbed in such a manner that they become part
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the general consciousness of mankind. They are rather differences
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of tone and colour, form or expression, which express the vital genius
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of the nation. There are features which serve to distinguish French
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy from the development which has occurred in Germany, Italy,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: England and America.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Modern French thought does not deliberately profess to maintain
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: allegiance to any past traditions, for it realises that such a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: procedure would be inconsistent with that freedom of thought which is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: bound up with the spirit of philosophy. It does, however, betray
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: certain national features, which are characteristic of the great
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French thinkers from Descartes, Pascal and Malebranche onwards.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: One of the most remarkable points about these thinkers was their
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intimacy with the sciences. Descartes, while founding modern
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy, also gave the world analytic geometry; Pascal made certain
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: physical discoveries and was an eminent mathematician. Malebranche,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: too, was keenly interested in science. In the following century the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Encyclopaedists displayed their wealth of scientific knowledge, and in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the nineteenth century we have seen the work of Comte based on
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: science, the ability of Cournot and Renouvier in mathematics, while
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: men like Boutroux, Hergson and Le Roy possess a thorough acquaintance
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: with modern science.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: These facts have marked results, and distinguish French philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: from that of Germany, where the majority of philosophers appear to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: haye been theological students in their youth and to have suffered
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: from the effects of their subject for the remainder of their lives.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Theological study does not produce clearness; it does not tend to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: cultivate a spirit of precision, but rather one of vagueness, of which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: much German philosophy is the product. On the other hand, mathematics
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is a study which demands clearness and which in turn increases the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spirit of clarity and precision.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: There is to be seen in our period a strong tendency to adhere to this
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: feature of clearness. Modern French philosophy is remarkably lucid.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Indeed, it is claimed that there is no notion, however profound it may
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: be, or however based on technical research it may be, which cannot be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: conveyed in the language of every day. French philosophy does not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: invent a highly technical vocabulary in order to give itself airs in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the eyes of the multitude, on the plea that obscurity is a sign of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: erudition and learning. On the contrary, it remembers Descartes'
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intimate association of clearness with truth, remembers, too, his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: clear and simple French which he preferred to the scholastic Latin. It
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: knows that to convince others of truth one must be at least clear to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: them and, what is equally important, one must be clear in one's own
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mind first. Clarity does not mean shallowness but rather the reverse,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: because it is due to keen perceptive power, to a seeing further into
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the heart of things, involving an intimate contact with reality.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French thought has always remained true to a certain "common sense."
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This is a dangerous and ambiguous term. In its true meaning it
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: signifies the general and sane mind of man free from all that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: prejudice or dogma or tradition, upon which, of course, "common sense"
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in the popular meaning is usually based. A genuine "common sense" is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: merely "_libert<e9>_" for the operation of that general reason which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: makes man what he is. It must be admitted that, owing to the fact that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy is taught in the _lyc<e9>es_, the French are the best educated
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of any nation in philosophical ideas and have a finer general sense of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that spirit of criticism and appreciation which is the essence of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy, than has any other modern nation. Philosophy in France is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: not written in order to appeal to any school or class. Not limited to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: an academic circle only, it makes its pronouncements to humanity and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thus embodies in a real form the principles of _egalit<e9>_ and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _fraternit<e9>_. It makes a democratic appeal both by its _clart<e9>_ and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: its belief that _la raison commune_ is in some degree present in every
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: human being.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Not only was clearness a strong point in the philosophy of Descartes,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: but there was also an insistence upon method. Since the time of his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: famous _Discours de la M<e9>thode_ there has always been a unique value
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: placed upon method in French thought, and this again serves to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: distinguish it profoundly from German philosophy, which is, in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: general, concerned with the conception and production of entire
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: systems. The idea of an individual and systematic construction is an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: ambitious conceit which is not in harmony with the principles of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _libert<e9>_, _egalit<e9>_, _fraternit<e9>_. Such a view of philosophical work
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is not a sociable one, from a human standpoint, and tends to give rise
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to a spirit of authority and tradition. Apart from this aspect of it,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: there is a more important consideration. All those systems take one
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: idea as their starting-point and build up an immense construction _a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: priori_. But another idea may be taken and opposed to that. There is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: thus an immense wastage of labour, and the individual effort is never
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: transcended. Yet an idea is only a portion of our intelligence, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that intelligence itself is, in turn, only a portion of reality. A
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: wider conception of philosophy must be aimed at, one in which the _vue
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: d'ensemble_ is not the effort of one mind, but of many, each
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: contributing its share to a harmonious conception, systematic in a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: sense, but not in the German sense. Modern French thought has a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dislike of system of the individualistic type; it realises that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: reality is too rich and complex for such a rapid construction to grasp
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it. It is opposed to systems, for the French mind looks upon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy as a manifestation of life itself--life blossoming to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: self-consciousness, striving ever to unfold itself more explicitly and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: more clearly, endeavouring to become more harmonious, more beautiful,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and more noble. The real victories of philosophical thought are not
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: indicated by the production of systems but by the discovery or
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: creation of ideas. Often these ideas have been single and simple, but
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: they have become veritable forces, in the life of mankind.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: French thinkers prefer to work collectively at particular problems
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: rather than at systems. Hence the aim and tone of their work is more
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: universal and human, and being more general is apt to be more
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: generous. This again is the expression of _liberte_, _<e9>galit<e9>_ and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: _fraternit<e9>_ in a true sense. The French prefer, as it were, in their
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophical campaign for the intellectual conquest of reality
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: diverse batteries of _soixante-quinze_ acting with precision and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: alertness to the clumsy production of a "Big Bertha." The production
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of ambitious systems, each professing to be the final word in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: presentation of reality, has not attracted the French spirit. It looks
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: at reality differently and prefers to deal with problems in a clear
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: way, thereby indicating a method which may be applied to the solution
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of others as they present themselves. This is infinitely preferable to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: an ambitious unification, which can only be obtained at the sacrifice
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: of clearness or meaning, and it arises from that keen contact with
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: life, which keeps the mind from dwelling too much in the slough of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: abstraction, from which some of the German philosophers never succeed
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in escaping. Their pilgrimage to the Celestial City ends there, and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: consequently the account of their itinerary cannot be of much use to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: other pilgrims.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Another feature of modern French thought is the intimacy of the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: connection between psychology and metaphysics, and the intensive
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: interest in psychology, which is but the imestigation of the inner
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: life of man. While in the early beginnings of ancient Greek philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: some time was spent in examining the outer world before man gave his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attention to the world within, we find Descartes, at the beginning of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: modern philosophy, making his own consciousness of his own existence
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: his starting-point. Introspection has always played a prominent part
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in French philosophy. Pascal was equally interested in the outer and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the inner world. Through Maine de Biran this feature has come down to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the new spiritualists and culminates in Bergson's thought, in which
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: psychological considerations hold first rank.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The social feature of modern French thought should not be omitted. In
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Germany subsequent thought has been coloured by the Reformation and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the particular aspects of that movement. In France one may well say
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: that subsequent thought has been marked by the Revolution. There is a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: theological flavour about most German philosophy, while France, a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: seething centre of political and social thought, has given to her
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy a more sociological trend.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: The French spirit in philosophy stands for clearness, concreteness and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: vitality. Consequently it presents a far greater brilliance, richness
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and variety than German philosophy displays._*_ This vitality and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: even exuber-* *ance, which are those of the spirit of youth
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: manifesting a _joie de vivre_ or an _<e9>lan vital_, have been very
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: strongly marked since the year 1880, and have placed French philosophy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in the van of human thought.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : It is, therefore to be lamented that French thought
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: has not received the attention which it deseives. In England far more
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: attention has been given to the nineteenth-century German philosophy,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: while the history of thought in France, especially in the period
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: between Comte and Bergson, has remained in sad neglect. This can and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: should be speedily remedied.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: It would be vain to ask whither its advance will lead. Even its own
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: principles prevent any such forecast; its creative richness may
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: blossom forth to-morrow in forms entirely new, for such is the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: characteristic of life itself, especially the life of the spirit, upon
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which so much stress is laid in modern French philosophy. The New
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Idealism lays great stress upon dynamism, voluntarism or action.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Freedom and creative activity are its keynotes, and life, ever fuller
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: and richer, is its aspiration. _La Vie_, of which France (and its
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: centre, Paris) is such an expression, finds formulation in the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy of contemporary thinkers._*_
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: [Footnote _*_ : The student of comparative thought will find it both
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: interesting and profitable to compare the work done recently in Italy
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: by Croce and Gentile. The intellectual kinship of Croce and Bergson
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: has frequently been pointed out, but Gentile's work comes very close
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: to the philosophy of action and to the whole positive-idealistic
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tendency of contemporary French thought. This is particularly to be
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: seen in _L'atto del pensare come atto puro_ (1912), and in _Teoria
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: generalo dello spirito come atto puro_ (1916). Professor Carr, the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: well-known exponent of Bergson's philosophy, remarks in his
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: introduction to the English edition of Gentile's book, "We may
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: individualise the mind as a natural thing-object person. . . . Yet our
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: power to think the mind in this way would be impossible were not the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mind with and by which we think it, itself not a thing, not a _fact_,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: but _act_; . . . never _factum_, but always _fieri_." This quotation
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is from p. xv of the _Theory of Mind as Pure Act_. With one other
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: quotation direct from Gentile we must close this reference to Italian
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: neo-idealism. "In so far as the subject is constituted a subject by
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: its own act it constitutes the object. . . . Mind is the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: transcendental activity productive of the objective world of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: experience" (pp. 18, 43). Compare with this our quotation from
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Ravaisson, given on p. 75 of this work, and the statement by Lachelier
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: on p. 122, both essential principles of the French New Idealism.]
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: One word of warning must be uttered against those who declare that the
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: tendency of French thought is in the direction of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: anti-intellectualism. Such a declaration rests on a misunderstanding,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: which we have endeavoured in our pages to disclose It is based
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: essentially upon a doctrine of Reason which belongs to the eighteenth
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: century. The severe rationalism of that period was mischievous in that
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: it rested upon a one-sided view of human nature, on a narrow
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: interpretation of "Reason" which gave it only a logical and almost
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: mathematical significance. To the Greeks, whom the French represent in
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the modern world, the term "NOUS" meant more than this-- it meant an
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intelligible harmony. We would do wrong to look upon the most recent
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: developments in France as being anti-rational, they are but a revolt
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: against the narrow view of Reason, and they constitute an attempt to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: present to the modern world a conception akin to that of the Greeks.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: Human reason is much more than a purely logical faculty, and it is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: this endeavour to relate all problems to life itself with its pulsing
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: throb, which represents the real attitude of the French mind. There is
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a realisation expressed throughout that thought, that life is more
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: than logic. The clearness of geometry showed Descartes that geometry
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: is not all-embracing. Pascal found that to the logic of geometry must
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: be added a spirit of appreciation which is not logical in its nature,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: but expresses another side of man's mind. To-day France sees that,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: although a philosophy must endeavour to satisfy the human
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: intelligence, a merely intellectual satisfaction is not enough. The
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: will and the feelings play their part, and it was the gteat fault of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: the eighteenth century to misunderstand this The search to-day is for
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: a system of values and of truth in action as well as a doctrine about
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: things in their purely theoretical aspects.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: This is a serious demand, and it is one which philosophy must
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: endeavour to appreciate Salvation will not be found in a mere
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dilettantism which can only express ieal indifference, nor in a
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: dogmatism which results in bigotry and pride. Criticism is required,
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: but not a purely destructive criticism, rather one which will offer
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: some acceptable view of the universe. Such a view must combine true
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: positivism or realism with a true idealism, by uniting fact and
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: spirit, things and ideas. Its achievement can only be possible to
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: minds possessing some creative and constructive power, yet minds who
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: have been schooled in the college of reality. This is the task of
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: philosophy in France and in other lands. That task consists not only
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: in finding values and in defining them but in expressing them
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander

text: actively, and in endeavouring to realise them in the common life.
title: Modern French Philosophy: a Study of the Development Since Comte
author: Gunn, John Alexander
